original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i sam ba ro da ya ma h'a tantra r'a dza sya padmi n'i n'a ma panytsi k'a /
analyzed: shr'i sam ba ro da ya ma h'a tantra r'a dza sya padmi n'i n'a ma panytsi k'a /
translated: Śrī-saṃvarodayamahātantra-rāja-padminīnāma-pañjikā.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel padma can zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel padma can zhes bya ba /
translated: The commentary on the great tantra king Glorious Emergence of Cakrasaṃvara called The Lotus.

original: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Cakrasaṃvara.

original: zab mo'i rin chen ma lus 'byung ba 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gcig pu'i gter //
analyzed: zab mo'i rin chen ma lus 'byung ba 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gcig pu'i gter //
translated: The sole treasure of life for beings, the source of all profound jewels,

original: rnam sad tshogs kyis yang dag brten pa ngo mtshar sna tshogs brgya phrag gnas //
analyzed: rnam sad tshogs kyis yang dag brten pa ngo mtshar sna tshogs brgya phrag gnas //
translated: The abode of hundreds of various wonders, well supported by the assembly of fully awakened ones,

original: dpa' mo yang dag ldan sku bdud rtsi dang bcas rab dang legs pa'i gzhi //
analyzed: dpa' mo yang dag ldan sku bdud rtsi dang bcas rab dang legs pa'i gzhi //
translated: The excellent basis endowed with the heroines and nectar,

original: sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud chen 'o ma'i rgya mtsho mkhas pa rnams kyis brten //
analyzed: sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud chen 'o ma'i rgya mtsho mkhas pa rnams kyis brten //
translated: The great tantra of the emergence of the binding ocean of milk, relied upon by the wise.

original: bla ma'i bka' drin sgron ma yi //
analyzed: bla ma'i bka' drin sgron ma yi //
translated: By the light of the lamp of the guru's kindness,

original: 'od kyis mun bsal blo mig gis //
analyzed: 'od kyis mun bsal blo mig gis //
translated: The eye of the mind removes the darkness,

original: sdom pa 'byung ba'i don ji snyed //
analyzed: sdom pa 'byung ba'i don ji snyed //
translated: And sees as much as possible the meaning of the emergence of the binding.

original: mthong ba 'dir ni bri bar bya //
analyzed: mthong ba 'dir ni bri bar bya //
translated: Here, I will write about it.

original: gal te bdag ltas 'di la zhugs kyang ji lta'i gting mtha' rtogs par mi nus mod //
analyzed: gal te bdag ltas 'di la zhugs kyang ji lta'i gting mtha' rtogs par mi nus mod //
translated: If I were to enter into this matter, I could not fathom its depths.

original: de lta na yang dge ba goms pa 'byung bar 'dod pas rnam par bshad pa brtsam ;
analyzed: de lta na yang dge ba goms pa 'byung bar 'dod pas rnam par bshad pa brtsam ;
translated: Nevertheless, I will undertake this explanation, desiring to cultivate virtue.

original: / gang gi chu bo'i gter gyi gting la kun du reg par nus pa nyid min na //
analyzed: / gang gi chu bo'i gter gyi gting la kun du reg par nus pa nyid min na //
translated: Those who enter into this ritual, though they cannot touch the depths of the ocean of the treasure of the Tathāgata’s knowledge,

original: cho ga der 'jug rnams kyis 'dod pa'i don dpal thob par 'gyur ba min nam ci //
analyzed: cho ga der 'jug rnams kyis 'dod pa'i don dpal thob par 'gyur ba min nam ci //
translated: do they not obtain the desired goal, the attainment of glory?

original: 'dir bcom ldan 'das nges par khams gsum @2a * //
analyzed: 'dir bcom ldan 'das nges par khams gsum @2a * //
translated: Here, the Blessed One, desiring to deliver all of the three realms,

original: ma lus pa 'don par bzhed pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs nas /
analyzed: ma lus pa 'don par bzhed pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs nas /
translated: having realized the enlightenment of perfect buddhahood,

original: skal pa ji lta bar 'gro ba rnams chos kyi bdud rtsis yang dag par tshim par mdzad do //
analyzed: skal pa ji lta bar 'gro ba rnams chos kyi bdud rtsis yang dag par tshim par mdzad do //
translated: satisfies migrating beings with the nectar of the Dharma, in accordance with their fortune.

original: yang 'ga' zhig de'i dus na nye bar mi gnas pa'i gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi phyir chos yang dag par bsdu ba 'di mdzad do //
analyzed: yang 'ga' zhig de'i dus na nye bar mi gnas pa'i gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi phyir chos yang dag par bsdu ba 'di mdzad do //
translated: Moreover, for the sake of those beings to be trained who are not present at that time, he performs this Dharma-recitation.

original: bsdu ba zhes bya ba ni 'bral pa dang go rims ji lta bar thos pa'i chos bstan bcos su nye bar bsdebs pa'o //🔽de la re zhig dang por lha dang lha ma yin dang mi la sogs pa 'gro ba mtha' dag gi ston pa gcig pu dam pa'i mchog mnyam pa med pa tshad mar gyur pa'i skyes bus bka' stsal pa nyid kyis bstan bcos 'di rang nyid kyis ma byas
analyzed: bsdu ba zhes bya ba ni 'bral pa dang go rims ji lta bar thos pa'i chos bstan bcos su nye bar bsdebs pa'o // de la re zhig dang por lha dang lha ma yin dang mi la sogs pa 'gro ba mtha' dag gi ston pa gcig pu dam pa'i mchog mnyam pa med pa tshad mar gyur pa'i skyes bus bka' stsal pa nyid kyis bstan bcos 'di rang nyid kyis ma byas
translated: The word “compendium” means that the Dharma that is heard is compiled in the treatise in accordance with the order and separation.

original: pa nyid de rna ba'i shes pas yang dag par khong du chud pa nyid kyis bdag nyid tshad mar gyur pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: pa nyid de rna ba'i shes pas yang dag par khong du chud pa nyid kyis bdag nyid tshad mar gyur pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In this regard, first of all, this treatise is not composed by itself, but is spoken by the one who is the sole teacher of all beings, gods, demigods, humans, and so forth, the supreme holy one, the unequaled, the authoritative person, in order to demonstrate that he himself is authoritative by means of the ear-consciousness.

original: 'di skad bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pa gsol ba btab pa zhes pa'i bar bcom ldan 'das sdud pa pos nyan pa'i skye bo 'jug pa'i yan lag tu nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pa gsol ba btab pa zhes pa'i bar bcom ldan 'das sdud pa pos nyan pa'i skye bo 'jug pa'i yan lag tu nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: Therefore, from “Thus have I heard” up to “requested,” the Blessed One, the compiler, has presented this as a limb for engaging the audience.

original: de gsungs pa /🔽dad ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu //
analyzed: de gsungs pa / dad ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu //
translated: He said this:🔽In order to engage the faithful,

original: rang nyid tshad mar rab bsgrub phyir //
analyzed: rang nyid tshad mar rab bsgrub phyir //
translated: in order to establish himself as authoritative,

original: ston pa 'khor dang dpang po dang // yul dang dus rnams nges par bstan //🔽sdud par byed pas 'jig rten du'ang //
analyzed: ston pa 'khor dang dpang po dang // yul dang dus rnams nges par bstan // sdud par byed pas 'jig rten du'ang //
translated: place, and time are definitely taught.🔽The compiler also indicates

original: yul dang dus ni nye bar mtshon //
analyzed: yul dang dus ni nye bar mtshon //
translated: place and time in the world.

original: @2b smra ba dbang por zhes brjod pas //
analyzed: @2b smra ba dbang por zhes brjod pas //
translated: Since it is said that the speaker is the lord,

original: tshad ma nyid ni lhag thob 'gyur //🔽zhes so // gal te so sor nges pa'i yul dang dus ma brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshad ma nyid ni lhag thob 'gyur // zhes so // gal te so sor nges pa'i yul dang dus ma brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: the validity is established by implication.🔽If you ask, “How are these valid cognitions since they do not mention a specific place and time?”

original: 'di dag ji ltar shes par byed pa yin zhe na brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ji ltar shes par byed pa yin zhe na brjod par bya ste /
translated: we reply:

original: de dag 'ba' zhig kho na nges par shes par byed pa'i gtso bo nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag 'ba' zhig kho na nges par shes par byed pa'i gtso bo nyid ma yin te /
translated: They are not the only principal valid cognitions.

original: de dag med kyang 'ga' zhig du dbang po tsam gyis tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag med kyang 'ga' zhig du dbang po tsam gyis tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even without them, in some cases, mere sense faculties become valid cognitions.

original: yul dang dus ni nye bar mtshon //
analyzed: yul dang dus ni nye bar mtshon //
translated: “Place and time are indicated”

original: zhes pa ni phal che ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phal che ba nyid kyis so //
translated: is stated in terms of the majority.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dus ni dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dus ni dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: In the Perfection Vehicle, time is not a thing.

original: yul kho na bsod nams dang ltad mo la sogs pa la 'gro bar rung ba nyid kyis nges par bstan to //
analyzed: yul kho na bsod nams dang ltad mo la sogs pa la 'gro bar rung ba nyid kyis nges par bstan to //
translated: The object is definitely indicated by the suitability of going to the place, the merit, the spectacle, and so on.

original: 'dir ni gang dang gang gi tshe gang dang gang kho nar gdul bar bya ba de dang de'i tshe de dang de kho nar bstan pa 'di rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir yul gyi nges pa yang bya bar mi nus so zhes thun mong du bstan pa kho nar
analyzed: 'dir ni gang dang gang gi tshe gang dang gang kho nar gdul bar bya ba de dang de'i tshe de dang de kho nar bstan pa 'di rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir yul gyi nges pa yang bya bar mi nus so zhes thun mong du bstan pa kho nar
translated: Here, the object is not determined because the teaching is engaged whenever and wherever there is someone to be trained.

original: mdzad do // yang na gang yul dang dus so sor nges pa dag kyang yod de /
analyzed: mdzad do // yang na gang yul dang dus so sor nges pa dag kyang yod de /
translated: Or, there are also those that are determined in terms of object and time.

original: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mos pa dman pa rnams kyi phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa nye bar bstan te /🔽zab mo la mos pa rnams kyi phyir dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bsam pa rnams kyi phyir /
analyzed: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mos pa dman pa rnams kyi phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa nye bar bstan te / zab mo la mos pa rnams kyi phyir dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bsam pa rnams kyi phyir /
translated: Thus, the Lord taught the Śrāvaka Vehicle for those of inferior aspiration.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rab tu gsal bar mdzad nas /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rab tu gsal bar mdzad nas /
translated: For those of the intent of detachment, he clarified the perfection system.

original: mchog tu zab pa'i chos kyi snod rnams kyi phyir dpal 'bras phung gi mchod rten du nag pa'i zla ba'i nyal dpal chos dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
analyzed: mchog tu zab pa'i chos kyi snod rnams kyi phyir dpal 'bras phung gi mchod rten du nag pa'i zla ba'i nyal dpal chos dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
translated: For the sake of those who are vessels for the most profound Dharma, he erected the maṇḍala of the glorious lord of speech, the realm of reality, at the glorious Dhānyakaṭaka Stūpa in the month of Kārtika.

original: sngags kyi tshul gyi bstan bcos mtha' dag gsal bar mdzad do zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags kyi tshul gyi bstan bcos mtha' dag gsal bar mdzad do zhes gsungs so //
translated: He illuminated all the treatises on the way of mantra.

original: 'on kyang 'dir dam pa'i don gyi tshul nyid kyis phyi rol gyi gzung bar zhen pa bsal ba'i phyir de nye bar ma bstan to zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dir dam pa'i don gyi tshul nyid kyis phyi rol gyi gzung bar zhen pa bsal ba'i phyir de nye bar ma bstan to zhes pa'o //
translated: However, here, in order to dispel attachment to external objects by means of the ultimate way, it is not taught.

original: yang na 'khor ba'i bar phyogs bcu ma lus pa nam mkha'i khams rab 'byams la gnas pa'i chos thams cad kyi rdul phra rab so so'i nang na gnas pa /
analyzed: yang na 'khor ba'i bar phyogs bcu ma lus pa nam mkha'i khams rab 'byams la gnas pa'i chos thams cad kyi rdul phra rab so so'i nang na gnas pa /
translated: Or else, in order to demonstrate that all phenomena abiding in the entire, limitless realm of space in the ten directions of saṃsāra, abiding within each atom,

original: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo'i gzhal yas khang pa'i nang du bzhugs pa nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir 'dir yul dang dus kyi nges pa ma gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo'i gzhal yas khang pa'i nang du bzhugs pa nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir 'dir yul dang dus kyi nges pa ma gsungs so //
translated: abide within the celestial mansion at the tip of the vajra jewel, here the determination of place and time is not mentioned.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang bya ba bsgrub pa'i rgyu dang / yon tan mtha' dag brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang bya ba bsgrub pa'i rgyu dang / yon tan mtha' dag brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: Because the words such as “thus” indicate the characteristics, the cause of accomplishing the action, and all the good qualities.

original: de ltar yang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ston pas rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas su 'di lta bu'i 'khor 'dus pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i zhu ba pos zhus pas chos 'di bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar yang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ston pas rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas su 'di lta bu'i 'khor 'dus pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i zhu ba pos zhus pas chos 'di bstan to //
translated: In this way, the Teacher of this sort taught this Dharma in this sort of place to this sort of assembly, this sort of questioner asking this sort of question.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar 'dir don gyi khyad par yang srid par 'gyur ro zhes gdul @3a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar 'dir don gyi khyad par yang srid par 'gyur ro zhes gdul @3a * //
translated: Therefore, without doubt, there is also a special meaning here.

original: bya'i skye bo nyan pa po rnams thos pa la sogs pa la shin tu gus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya'i skye bo nyan pa po rnams thos pa la sogs pa la shin tu gus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the disciples who are the persons to be trained will have great respect for listening and so forth.

original: rgyu'i yon tan brjod pa rnams kyang 'bras bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsal byed du 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: rgyu'i yon tan brjod pa rnams kyang 'bras bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsal byed du 'gyur ba ni /
translated: The expression of the good qualities of the cause also serves to clarify the good qualities of the effect.

original: ji ltar 'tshed pa la sogs pa'i bya bas gang zhig bsgrub pa na sgrub byed mdzad mkhan la sogs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'tshed pa la sogs pa'i bya bas gang zhig bsgrub pa na sgrub byed mdzad mkhan la sogs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as when an action such as cooking is accomplished, the qualities of the agent, etc. are praised.

original: 'on kyang ston pa po kho na 'dir brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa yang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang ston pa po kho na 'dir brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa yang ngo //
translated: However, only the teacher is to be mentioned here, as the one who speaks and the one who is spoken about.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: He says:

original: brtag pa gnyis kyi rgyal por /
analyzed: brtag pa gnyis kyi rgyal por /
translated: In the Tantra of the Two Examinations:

original: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
analyzed: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
translated: The expounder is I, and the Dharma is I,

original: rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga //
analyzed: rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga //
translated: The listener endowed with the assembly is I.

original: zhes so // de'i phyir rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dang 'brel pa dang dgos pa dang de'i dgos pa rnams kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de'i phyir rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dang 'brel pa dang dgos pa dang de'i dgos pa rnams kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the connection between the expounder and the spoken about, the purpose, and the purpose of that, should be stated.

original: de la le'u sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi rgyud 'di ni rjod bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la le'u sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi rgyud 'di ni rjod bar byed pa'o //
translated: Therein, this Tantra, which has a body of thirty-three chapters, is the expounder.

original: rim pa gnyis yan lag dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis yan lag dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of the two stages together with the branches, the Bhagavat Sri Heruka, who is the essence of cause and effect, is the spoken about.

original: de dag gis brjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gis brjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: The definition of that which is expressed and that which expresses is the relationship.

original: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la rgyud kyi don rtogs par gyur pa ni bstan bcos kyi dgos pa'o //
analyzed: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la rgyud kyi don rtogs par gyur pa ni bstan bcos kyi dgos pa'o //
translated: The understanding of the meaning of the treatise in the continuum of the disciple is the purpose of the treatise.

original: rim gyis sgrib pa gnyis spangs te 'gro ba mtha' dag la nye bar mkho bas phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o zhes bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: rim gyis sgrib pa gnyis spangs te 'gro ba mtha' dag la nye bar mkho bas phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o zhes bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: The attainment of the great seal through the abandonment of the two obscurations in stages, which is necessary for all transmigrators, is the ultimate purpose.

original: yan lag gi don la yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: yan lag gi don la yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: The meaning of the branches should also be stated.

original: 'di skad ces pa ji ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba de kho na ltar chad pa dang lhag pa med do zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'di skad ces pa ji ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba de kho na ltar chad pa dang lhag pa med do zhes pa ste /
translated: As it will be explained, thus means that there is neither omission nor addition.

original: 'dis sdud par byed pa po bdag nyid gzungs rab tu thob par bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis sdud par byed pa po bdag nyid gzungs rab tu thob par bstan to //
translated: This indicates that the compiler himself has attained retention.

original: bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs dngos las thos par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs dngos las thos par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to indicate the actual hearing with I heard, etc.

original: phyin ci log gi dgos pa sel bar byed de gsungs pa'i don ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi dgos pa sel bar byed de gsungs pa'i don ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It eliminates the purpose of error, because it reveals the meaning that is taught.

original: yang na gang thos pa nyid de bdag gis mngon sum du byas pa dang rang gis byas pa ma yin no zhes pas te 'dis ni chos kyi mchog tu zab pa nyid bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na gang thos pa nyid de bdag gis mngon sum du byas pa dang rang gis byas pa ma yin no zhes pas te 'dis ni chos kyi mchog tu zab pa nyid bstan par bya'o //
translated: Or else, it is what I have heard, and not what I have directly perceived or done myself. This shows the profundity of the highest doctrine.

original: yang na bdag gis re zhig 'di skad thos la /
analyzed: yang na bdag gis re zhig 'di skad thos la /
translated: Or else, I have heard it in this way for the time being,

original: gzhan rnams kyis rnam pa gzhan du yang ste /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis rnam pa gzhan du yang ste /
translated: but others in another way.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i tshul rnams lhag par mos pa'i dbang gis rnam pa du mar rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i tshul rnams lhag par mos pa'i dbang gis rnam pa du mar rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For the modes of teaching of the Lord enter into many forms through the power of the different dispositions of those to be taught.

original: dus gcig na zhes pa skad cig gcig kho na la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bstan cing bdag gis kyang thos zhes pas te /
analyzed: dus gcig na zhes pa skad cig gcig kho na la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bstan cing bdag gis kyang thos zhes pas te /
translated: At one time, in one moment, the Lord taught and I heard.

original: 'dis ni bdag nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni bdag nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob ba nyid du'o //
translated: This shows that he himself has attained the inconceivable door of liberation.

original: yang na gcig gi tshe 'di dang gzhan gyi tshe gzhan zhes pa ste thos pa mang bar ro //
analyzed: yang na gcig gi tshe 'di dang gzhan gyi tshe gzhan zhes pa ste thos pa mang bar ro //
translated: Or else, at one time he heard this, at another time he heard that, and so on, because he has heard much.

original: yang na dus gcig kho na @3b 'di ltar thos la gzhan gyi tshe res 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes pa ste /
analyzed: yang na dus gcig kho na @3b 'di ltar thos la gzhan gyi tshe res 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes pa ste /
translated: Or else, it is heard only at one time, and not at any other time.

original: chos rnyed dka' ba nyid du rab tu bstan no //
analyzed: chos rnyed dka' ba nyid du rab tu bstan no //
translated: Thus, the difficulty of finding the opportunity of a human life is taught.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes ba dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa bcom pa'i phyir yang zhes pa ste /🔽'dis ni legs par yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par khong du chud pa rang gi don gyi 'byor pa mtha' dag phul du byung zhing mthar thug pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi don gyi 'byor pa ma lus
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes ba dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa bcom pa'i phyir yang zhes pa ste / 'dis ni legs par yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par khong du chud pa rang gi don gyi 'byor pa mtha' dag phul du byung zhing mthar thug pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi don gyi 'byor pa ma lus
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he possesses the qualities of the lord and so forth, and because he has conquered the demons of the afflictions and so forth.

original: pa sgrub pa'i nus pa mnga' ba'i ston pa yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa sgrub pa'i nus pa mnga' ba'i ston pa yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: This indicates that he is a teacher who possesses the perfection of his own goal, the complete and pure accumulations of merit and wisdom, and who is capable of accomplishing the perfection of the goal of others, the complete and perfect attainment of the two aims of beings.

original: thams cad ces pa de thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang ste /
analyzed: thams cad ces pa de thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang ste /
translated: All of them are thus-gone ones.

original: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sprul pa dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sprul pa dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnams so //
translated: Their emanations of body, speech, and mind, and their Dharma and Enjoyment Bodies.

original: de nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi phyir dang de'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir yang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bha ga'o //
analyzed: de nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi phyir dang de'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir yang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bha ga'o //
translated: That itself is the bhaga of Vajrayoginī, because it is the nature of great bliss and because it is the cause of that.

original: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Or, the vajra of body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas is the Blessed One Vajrasattva.

original: de'i rnal 'byor ma dang de'i bha ga'o //
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor ma dang de'i bha ga'o //
translated: He is the yogin, and his bhaga is the bhaga.

original: yang na de nyid bha ga ste de la'o //
analyzed: yang na de nyid bha ga ste de la'o //
translated: Or, that itself is the bhaga, and in that.

original: btsun mo thams cad bsdus pa'i rang bzhin nyid las mang po'o tshig go //
analyzed: btsun mo thams cad bsdus pa'i rang bzhin nyid las mang po'o tshig go //
translated: Many is said because of the nature of the collection of all queens.

original: rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: In both cases, it means in the celestial mansion located in the source of phenomena.

original: bla na med pa'i chos kyi rol pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba'i gnas nyid kyis gnas phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bstan to //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i chos kyi rol pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba'i gnas nyid kyis gnas phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bstan to //
translated: The excellence of the place is taught by the fact that it is the abode of the highest play, joy, and bliss of Dharma.

original: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa rab tu bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa rab tu bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the excellence of the retinue, he says:

original: 'phags pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste sdig pa'i chos rnams las ring bar spyod pa'i phyir 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste sdig pa'i chos rnams las ring bar spyod pa'i phyir 'phags pa'o //
translated: Noble means noble because it is far removed from evil dharmas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rnams kyis kun du dga' bar byed pa zhes pa 'phags pa kun dga' bo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rnams kyis kun du dga' bar byed pa zhes pa 'phags pa kun dga' bo'o //
translated: Ānanda means he who delights in the Buddha's teachings with samādhi, etc.

original: sogs pa ni de 'dod chags dang bral ba gang rnams kyi dang po yin pa de bzhin du de'o //
analyzed: sogs pa ni de 'dod chags dang bral ba gang rnams kyi dang po yin pa de bzhin du de'o //
translated: And so on means that just as he was the first of those who were free from desire, so he was the first of those who were free from desire.

original: de rnams kyi bskor ba thog mar te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bskor ba thog mar te /
translated: Their circle means the circle of those who were free from desire.

original: gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis de bzhin du de'o //
analyzed: gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis de bzhin du de'o //
translated: Surrounded by a multitude of bodhisattvas means surrounded by a multitude of bodhisattvas such as Avalokiteśvara.

original: ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang du byas pa rnams 'dir zhugs te /
analyzed: ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang du byas pa rnams 'dir zhugs te /
translated: How is it that those who are established in the Disciple Vehicle enter here?

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bsam pa'i phyir dang / shes rab dman pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bsam pa'i phyir dang / shes rab dman pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: Because of their desire for freedom from passion and because of their inferior wisdom.

original: gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gsungs pa ni /
translated: It is said:

original: dge slong bsam gtan la gnas gang //
analyzed: dge slong bsam gtan la gnas gang //
translated: The monk who abides in meditation,

original: gang yang rtog ge dga' ba'i mi //🔽rgas @4a * //
analyzed: gang yang rtog ge dga' ba'i mi // rgas @4a * //
translated: and the man who delights in logic,

original: pa'i rten la gnas pa gang //
analyzed: pa'i rten la gnas pa gang //
translated: and the one who abides in the support of old age,

original: de la de nyid bstan mi bya //
analyzed: de la de nyid bstan mi bya //
translated: for them reality should not be taught.

original: zhes so zhe na brjod par bya ste /🔽'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i nyan thos pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes so zhe na brjod par bya ste / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i nyan thos pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: We reply:

original: nyan thos nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: These are emanation disciples of the Bodhisattva, not disciples by nature.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du kun dga' bo ni kun du bzang po yin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du kun dga' bo ni kun du bzang po yin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the Yoga Tantra, the uncommon secret, Ananda is Samantabhadra, and so on.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bstan pa nyid las rtogs te /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bstan pa nyid las rtogs te /
translated: Thus, the retinue of the Bodhisattva is understood from the teaching itself.

original: ci'i don du slar so sor bstan zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i don du slar so sor bstan zhe na /
translated: For what purpose is it taught again?

original: sngags kyi tshul la sgrub pa po dge slong mchog nyid du rtogs pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi tshul la sgrub pa po dge slong mchog nyid du rtogs pa'i don du'o //
translated: In the way of mantra, the practitioner is understood to be a monk, the best.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus,

original: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa bya //
analyzed: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa bya //
translated: he is a vajra-holding monk.

original: de ni ma rungs bsdigs pa'i mchog / ces so /
analyzed: de ni ma rungs bsdigs pa'i mchog / ces so /
translated: He is the best of those who threaten the wicked.

original: phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis kyang //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis kyang //
translated: And Vajrapani's foot

original: khyim pa dang dge tshul gyi slob dpon la ltos nas slob dpon dge slong mchog tu gsungs so //
analyzed: khyim pa dang dge tshul gyi slob dpon la ltos nas slob dpon dge slong mchog tu gsungs so //
translated: says that the monk is the best of the masters, in dependence on the householder and novice monk.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa tsam la lhag par mos pa shes rab dman pa la ltos nas ni bkag pa yang 'thad pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa tsam la lhag par mos pa shes rab dman pa la ltos nas ni bkag pa yang 'thad pa'i don to //
translated: And it is reasonable to prohibit the latter in dependence on those who have inferior wisdom and are devoted only to the vehicle of the śrāvakas.

original: bye ba phrag brgyad cu zhes pa grangs med pa nyid yin yang gtso bo rnams kyi grangs bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bye ba phrag brgyad cu zhes pa grangs med pa nyid yin yang gtso bo rnams kyi grangs bstan pa'o //
translated: The phrase eighty koṭis means that although there are countless [bodhisattvas], it teaches the number of the principal ones.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
translated: The yogins are those who engage in the union of wisdom and method.

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: It is the samādhi of the union of śamatha and vipaśyanā.

original: de gang rnams la yod pa de rnams dbang phyug ste phul du byung ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gang rnams la yod pa de rnams dbang phyug ste phul du byung ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is the Lord of those who have that, because he has attained the highest.

original: zhu ba po phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhu ba po phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: The excellence of the questioner is stated:

original: phyag na rdo rje zhes pa ste me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin mtshon pa'i rdo rje gang gi phyag na lag mthil ltar yod pa de bzhin du de'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje zhes pa ste me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin mtshon pa'i rdo rje gang gi phyag na lag mthil ltar yod pa de bzhin du de'o //
translated: He is Vajrapāṇi, who has a vajra in his hand, like the palm of his hand, which symbolizes the meditative concentration of the nature of the five intuitions such as the mirrorintuition.

original: 'dzum pa zhes pa ston pa'i dgongs pa mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: 'dzum pa zhes pa ston pa'i dgongs pa mtshon pa ste /
translated: Smiling, he symbolizes the intention of the Teacher.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ston par bzhed pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par 'khor rnams btang snyoms su mi lus pa'i phyir zhes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mtshan ma nye bar ston par mdzad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ston par bzhed pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par 'khor rnams btang snyoms su mi lus pa'i phyir zhes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mtshan ma nye bar ston par mdzad de /
translated: The Buddhas, the Lords, manifest signs, because they do not want the assembly to be indifferent, having understood the intention of the Tathāgatas who want to teach.

original: ji ltar 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i dus na 'phags pa byams pa la rnam par gzigs pa dang 'od zer rab tu bkye ba dang 'dzum pa rab tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rtags rnam pa gsum nye bar bstan pa bzhin
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i dus na 'phags pa byams pa la rnam par gzigs pa dang 'od zer rab tu bkye ba dang 'dzum pa rab tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rtags rnam pa gsum nye bar bstan pa bzhin
translated: Just as when the noble perfection of wisdom was taught, the noble Maitreya was looked at, light rays were emitted, and the characteristic of a clear smile was demonstrated, the three kinds of signs.

original: no // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa de rnams yod kyang phyag na rdo rje la rnam par gzigs pa ni /
analyzed: no // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa de rnams yod kyang phyag na rdo rje la rnam par gzigs pa ni /
translated: Although those such as the noble Avalokiteśvara exist, he looked at Vajrapāṇi

original: 'di sku gzugs dang dam pa'i chos bsrung bar nus pa'i phyir @4b dang ; rdo rje theg pa sdud pa la dbang ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar dka' ba 'dul bar nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di sku gzugs dang dam pa'i chos bsrung bar nus pa'i phyir @4b dang ; rdo rje theg pa sdud pa la dbang ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar dka' ba 'dul bar nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is able to protect the image and the true Dharma, because he is the lord of the collection of the Vajra Vehicle, and because he is able to tame those difficult to tame.

original: stan las langs te zhes pa chos la gus pas dul ba dang / rab tu dang ba'i sbyor ba las ma 'ongs pa'i slob ma la bslab pa'i don du yang ngo //
analyzed: stan las langs te zhes pa chos la gus pas dul ba dang / rab tu dang ba'i sbyor ba las ma 'ongs pa'i slob ma la bslab pa'i don du yang ngo //
translated: Rising from his seat means that, out of respect for the Dharma, he was disciplined and applied himself with faith, and also for the sake of training future disciples.

original: gang yang 'di nyid kyis rgyud mtha' dag gi bsdus ba'i don bstan te de ltar yang gsal ba dang go bar byed pa zhes pa rgyud do //
analyzed: gang yang 'di nyid kyis rgyud mtha' dag gi bsdus ba'i don bstan te de ltar yang gsal ba dang go bar byed pa zhes pa rgyud do //
translated: Also, this very [verse] teaches the summarized meaning of all the tantras. Thus, it is a tantra, which is called that which clarifies and makes understood.

original: de ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: That [tantra] is threefold:

original: thabs kyi rgyud dang / rgyu'i rgyud dang / 'bras bu'i rgyud kyang ngo //
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyud dang / rgyu'i rgyud dang / 'bras bu'i rgyud kyang ngo //
translated: the method tantra, the cause tantra, and the result tantra.

original: de gsungs pa 'dus pa phyi ma las //
analyzed: de gsungs pa 'dus pa phyi ma las //
translated: That is stated in the Later Guhyasamāja:

original: rgyud ni rgyun chags su brjod de //
analyzed: rgyud ni rgyun chags su brjod de //
translated: A tantra is said to be a continuum.

original: rgyud de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyud de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
translated: That tantra becomes threefold:

original: rten dang rang bzhin nyid dang ni //
analyzed: rten dang rang bzhin nyid dang ni //
translated: The support, the nature itself,

original: mi 'phrogs pa yi rab dbye las //
analyzed: mi 'phrogs pa yi rab dbye las //
translated: and the classification of the unassailable.

original: zhes pa'o // de la 'bras bu'i rgyud ni zung 'jug gi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang ste /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de la 'bras bu'i rgyud ni zung 'jug gi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang ste /
translated: Among those, the result tantra is the Bhagavān glorious Vajradhara, the nature of union.

original: ston pa po'i rang bzhin brjod pa'i phyir gsungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: ston pa po'i rang bzhin brjod pa'i phyir gsungs pa nyid do //
translated: It is stated for the purpose of expressing the nature of the teacher.

original: gal te yang sgrub pa po dang 'brel pa'i 'bras bu kho na brjod par rigs pa de lta na yang rdzogs par gyur pa na 'di lta bu nyid kyi 'bras bu 'grub po zhes de dang 'dra ba kho nas gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te yang sgrub pa po dang 'brel pa'i 'bras bu kho na brjod par rigs pa de lta na yang rdzogs par gyur pa na 'di lta bu nyid kyi 'bras bu 'grub po zhes de dang 'dra ba kho nas gsungs so //
translated: Even if it is appropriate to state only the result related to the practitioner, still, when it is complete, the result is just like that, so it is stated as just similar.

original: gzhan yang sngags kyi tshul la sgrub pa po'i rang bzhin grub pa yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po nyid yod pa la yang dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par dmigs pa nyid kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs mtha' dag spangs pas 'dod pa'i bsgrub🔽bya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang sngags kyi tshul la sgrub pa po'i rang bzhin grub pa yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po nyid yod pa la yang dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par dmigs pa nyid kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs mtha' dag spangs pas 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, in the mantra system, the nature of the practitioner is the essence of the completely accomplished buddha, which exists, and by observing it as free from stains and completely pure, all opposing factors are abandoned, so the desired goal is accomplished.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni bsgrub pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni bsgrub pa'i rgyu //
translated: The cause for accomplishing buddhahood

original: rnam pa thams cad sangs rgyas sbyor //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad sangs rgyas sbyor //
translated: is the connection with all aspects of buddhahood.

original: zhes so // de bzhin du ye shes zhabs kyis kyang //
analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin du ye shes zhabs kyis kyang //
translated: Similarly, Jñānapāda also says:

original: kun du bzang po'i bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i bdag nyid ni //
translated: The nature of Samantabhadra

original: bsgom pa'i 'bad pa byang chub che //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i 'bad pa byang chub che //
translated: is the great enlightenment of the effort of meditation.

original: zhes so // sangs rgyas kyi snying po nyid nye bar bstan pa yang rgyu gsum rnams nyid kyis te rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi sku khyab pa dang / de de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par rung ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes so // sangs rgyas kyi snying po nyid nye bar bstan pa yang rgyu gsum rnams nyid kyis te rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi sku khyab pa dang / de de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par rung ba nyid kyis so //
translated: The teaching of the essence of Buddhahood is also by means of three causes: the pervasion of the Dharma Body of the perfect Buddha, because of the inseparability of that from thusness, and because of the possibility of attaining Buddhahood.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku 'phro'i phyir //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku 'phro'i phyir //
translated: Because of the pervasion of the body of the perfect Buddha,

original: de bzhin nyid dbyer med phyir dang // kun la rtag tu rigs yod phyir //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dbyer med phyir dang // kun la rtag tu rigs yod phyir //
translated: because of the inseparability of thusness, and because of the always existing potential in all,

original: lus can sangs rgyas snying po'o //
analyzed: lus can sangs rgyas snying po'o //
translated: embodied beings are the essence of Buddhahood.

original: zhes so // de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid 'bras bu dang lam du yang ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid 'bras bu dang lam du yang ste /
translated: Thus, the Bhagavān is the result and the path.

original: rgyu'i rgyud ni ltos nas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i rgyud ni ltos nas brjod par bya'o //
translated: The causal continuum should be expressed in dependence.

original: ae yig ni lha mo'i chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ae yig ni lha mo'i chos 'byung ngo //
translated: The letter e is the goddess’s dharmodaya.

original: wam yig ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: wam yig ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The letter vaṃ is the vajra.

original: ma y'a zhes pa 'dus @5a * //
analyzed: ma y'a zhes pa 'dus @5a * //
translated: The māyā is the union.

original: pa'o ; / shru tam zhes pa zhu zhing ltung ba'o //
analyzed: pa'o ; / shru tam zhes pa zhu zhing ltung ba'o //
translated: The śṛṅga is the falling supplication.

original: dus gcig na zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems mtha' dag nye bar dmigs pa rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i skad cig la bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje bde ba chen po dang dbyer med🔽pa'i sku bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: dus gcig na zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems mtha' dag nye bar dmigs pa rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i skad cig la bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje bde ba chen po dang dbyer med pa'i sku bzhugs pa ste /
translated: At one time means that the Bhagavān, the vajra of bodhicitta, indivisible from great bliss, abides in the moment of the connate joy that is the nature of the perfection of the direct perception of the entire body, speech, and mind.

original: chos thams cad khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides in the nature of pervading all phenomena.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: ae yig bha ga zhes par brjod //
analyzed: ae yig bha ga zhes par brjod //
translated: The syllable e is said to be the bhaga.

original: yi ge wam ni rdo rjer dran //
analyzed: yi ge wam ni rdo rjer dran //
translated: The syllable vam is known as the vajra.

original: ma y'a zhes pa bskyod par byed //
analyzed: ma y'a zhes pa bskyod par byed //
translated: The syllable ma is said to be the shaking.

original: shru tam gang de rnam gnyis 'dod //
analyzed: shru tam gang de rnam gnyis 'dod //
translated: The syllable śru is asserted to be the two.

original: khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'gyur //
analyzed: khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'gyur //
translated: The Bhagavān is the form of the seminal fluid.

original: de yi bde ba 'dod mar bran ;
analyzed: de yi bde ba 'dod mar bran ;
translated: His bliss is the servant of Rāvaṇa.

original: / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs rang bzhin //
analyzed: / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of the dharma and saṃbhoga is

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristic of Vajrasattva.

original: zhes so // yang na /
analyzed: zhes so // yang na /
translated: Or,🔽

original: ae yig sa ru shes par bya //
analyzed: ae yig sa ru shes par bya //
translated: The syllable e is known as the earth.

original: las kyi phyag rgya las can ma //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya las can ma //
translated: The karma mudra is the one with karma.

original: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
analyzed: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
translated: At the navel, in the emanation wheel,

original: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhir gnas //
analyzed: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhir gnas //
translated: it abides with sixty-four petals.

original: wam yig chu ru shes par bya //
analyzed: wam yig chu ru shes par bya //
translated: The syllable vaṃ is known as water.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya m'a ma k'i //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya m'a ma k'i //
translated: The doctrine seal is Māmakī.

original: snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo la //
analyzed: snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo la //
translated: At the heart, in the doctrine wheel,

original: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad par gnas //
analyzed: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad par gnas //
translated: it abides with eight lotus petals.

original: ma yig me ru nges par bstan //
analyzed: ma yig me ru nges par bstan //
translated: The syllable ma is taught to be fire.

original: phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo //
translated: The great seal is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo la //
analyzed: mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo la //
translated: At the throat, in the enjoyment wheel,

original: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad gnyis gnas //
analyzed: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad gnyis gnas //
translated: it abides with sixteen lotus petals.

original: y'a yig rlung du rab tu brjod //
analyzed: y'a yig rlung du rab tu brjod //
translated: The syllable ya is said to be wind.

original: dam tshig phyag rgya sgrol ma ste ;
analyzed: dam tshig phyag rgya sgrol ma ste ;
translated: The pledge seal is Tārā,

original: / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas //
analyzed: / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas //
translated: who abides in the wheel of great bliss.

original: chu skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis //
analyzed: chu skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis //
translated: It has thirty-two lotus petals.

original: shru tam lhan skyes zhes par brjod //
analyzed: shru tam lhan skyes zhes par brjod //
translated: The syllable śru is said to be the innate.

original: rnam gnyis dbye bas phye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam gnyis dbye bas phye ba'o //
translated: It is divided into two types.

original: zhes pa'o // lhag ma ni sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // lhag ma ni sngar bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dga' ba mchog la sogs pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dga' ba mchog la sogs pa yod pa'o //
translated: Ārya Ānanda and so forth means that they have supreme transcendent joy and so forth.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes pa 'dod chags la sogs pa rang bzhin brgyad cu rnams kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa bde ba chen po'i rnal 'byor las yon tan du gyur pa nyid kyis dbang phyug rnams kyi dbus su gyur🔽pa'o // gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes pa 'dod chags la sogs pa rang bzhin brgyad cu rnams kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa bde ba chen po'i rnal 'byor las yon tan du gyur pa nyid kyis dbang phyug rnams kyi dbus su gyur pa'o // gsungs pa yang /
translated: The noble Avalokiteśvara is the middle among the lords, because of being the very quality of the yoga of great bliss, which is of one taste with emptiness, the nature of the eighty natural instincts such as passion, etc.

original: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
analyzed: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
translated: It is also said: The instincts become the limbs of enlightenment.

original: zhes so // phyag na rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes so // phyag na rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Vajrapāṇi is nondual intuition.

original: rnam par gzigs pa ni nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par gzigs pa ni nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: The vision is the experience.

original: stan las langs te zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin de las langs te yang na gsang ba'i 'khor lo las so //
analyzed: stan las langs te zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin de las langs te yang na gsang ba'i 'khor lo las so //
translated: The arising from the seat is the arising from that samādhi, or from the secret cakra.

original: @5b bla gos phrag par byas nas zhes pa yan lag mchog la thob par byas nas so //
analyzed: @5b bla gos phrag par byas nas zhes pa yan lag mchog la thob par byas nas so //
translated: The throwing the upper robe over one shoulder is the attainment of the supreme branch.

original: bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda las /
analyzed: bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda las /
translated: The right knee touching the ground is the gesture of the Tathāgata.

original: yongs su dag pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The enjoyment body is completely pure.

original: sa la zhes pa chos nyid la'o //
analyzed: sa la zhes pa chos nyid la'o //
translated: On the ground means on reality.

original: de nyid lag pa thal mo sbyar bar byas nas zhes pa srid pa dang zhi ba dbyer med par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid lag pa thal mo sbyar bar byas nas zhes pa srid pa dang zhi ba dbyer med par gyur pa'o //
translated: That very [enjoyment body] is the joined palms, the indivisibility of existence and peace.

original: bcom ldan 'das la zhes pa rje btsun gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la zhes pa rje btsun gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid pa'o //
translated: To the Blessed One means to the exalted one, the nondual gnosis itself.

original: gsol ba btab pa zhes pa yid la byed pa med pa nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gsol ba btab pa zhes pa yid la byed pa med pa nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: The supplication means the urging of the benefit of beings by the very absence of mental activity.

original: bskyar nas bshad pa la 'brel pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bskyar nas bshad pa la 'brel pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: The repetition is not without connection.

original: thabs kyi rgyud kyang 'di nyid kyis rnam par bshad de /
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyud kyang 'di nyid kyis rnam par bshad de /
translated: The method tantra is also explained by this very [verse].

original: thabs zhes bya ba nye bar len pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rgyu'i rgyud kyi lhan cig byed rgyu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thabs zhes bya ba nye bar len pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rgyu'i rgyud kyi lhan cig byed rgyu gnas pa'o //
translated: The method is the abiding of the causal tantra that is the cooperative cause for the appropriating cause.

original: yang na gang rgyud gsum ka yang rnam par bshad pa 'di nyid kyis gsungs par gtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na gang rgyud gsum ka yang rnam par bshad pa 'di nyid kyis gsungs par gtogs par bya'o //
translated: Or, whatever is the three tantras is to be included in this very explanation.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang khyad par ni de ma thag bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang khyad par ni de ma thag bshad par bya'o //
translated: The difference between the thing that is the cause and the thing that is the result will be explained immediately.

original: gal te rdo rje 'chang nyid ni bskyed bya dang rnam par bsgyur bya dang thob bya rnams las cir 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te rdo rje 'chang nyid ni bskyed bya dang rnam par bsgyur bya dang thob bya rnams las cir 'gyur /
translated: If Vajradhara is the thing to be produced, the thing to be transformed, and the thing to be attained, what is he?

original: bskyed bya yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bskyed bya yin no zhe na /
translated: If he is the thing to be produced,

original: rnam par 'jigs pa dang phyogs gcig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par 'jigs pa dang phyogs gcig par 'gyur ro //
translated: he would be partially liberated and partially not liberated.

original: gsungs pa yang dge slong rnams gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can yin no zhes so //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang dge slong rnams gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can yin no zhes so //
translated: It is said, “Monks, whatever is a phenomenon that has an origin is a phenomenon that has a cessation.”

original: de'i phyir slar 'khor ba pa nyid du 'gyur gyis phyogs gcig pa nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir slar 'khor ba pa nyid du 'gyur gyis phyogs gcig pa nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, he would be partially in saṃsāra and partially not in saṃsāra. He would not be omniscient because he would be partially liberated.

original: yul dang dus bzlog nas gnas skabs gzhan gcig par shes pa la yul dang dus gzhan mi shes pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dus bzlog nas gnas skabs gzhan gcig par shes pa la yul dang dus gzhan mi shes pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is possible that someone who knows one state of affairs in a particular place and time does not know other states of affairs in other places and times.

original: de'i phyir grol ba dang ma grol ba dag khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir grol ba dang ma grol ba dag khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would follow that there would be no difference between the liberated and the non-liberated.

original: rnam par bsgyur bya'i phyogs ni bskyed bya'i phyogs dang khyad par med de /
analyzed: rnam par bsgyur bya'i phyogs ni bskyed bya'i phyogs dang khyad par med de /
translated: The side that is transformed is not different from the side that is to be produced.

original: 'ga' zhig gis gnas skabs can gcig nyid kyi gnas skabs gzhan bzlog nas gnas skabs gzhan rab tu 'jug pa la gser la sogs pa'i rna rgyan gyi dngos po la sogs pa ltar rnam par 'gyur ba'i tha snyad do //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis gnas skabs can gcig nyid kyi gnas skabs gzhan bzlog nas gnas skabs gzhan rab tu 'jug pa la gser la sogs pa'i rna rgyan gyi dngos po la sogs pa ltar rnam par 'gyur ba'i tha snyad do //
translated: When one state of a single thing is reversed and another state is engaged, like the thing that is an earring made of gold, etc., there is the convention of transformation.

original: de yang skad cig 'jig par smra ba'i sangs rgyas pa rnams kyi 'dod pa la mi srid de /
analyzed: de yang skad cig 'jig par smra ba'i sangs rgyas pa rnams kyi 'dod pa la mi srid de /
translated: Moreover, that is impossible for the Buddhists who assert momentary destruction.

original: shin tu mtshungs pa rnams kyis kyang skad cig so sor rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jig pa 'byung ba'i rang bzhin @6a * //🔽nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu mtshungs pa rnams kyis kyang skad cig so sor rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jig pa 'byung ba'i rang bzhin @6a * // nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because even very similar things are destroyed without being followed by a subsequent moment.

original: thob bya nyid la ni nyes pa mang ste thob bya'i 'bras bu lhan cig byed pa dang nye bar len pa dag nye bar mkho ba med do //
analyzed: thob bya nyid la ni nyes pa mang ste thob bya'i 'bras bu lhan cig byed pa dang nye bar len pa dag nye bar mkho ba med do //
translated: There are many faults in the position of attainment. The effect that is to be attained does not need coemergent or appropriated causes.

original: gang yang thob ba zhes bya ba ni ma thob ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang thob ba zhes bya ba ni ma thob ba thob pa'o //
translated: Moreover, that which is called attainment is the attainment of what has not been attained.

original: de yang tha dad pa nyid la rigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang tha dad pa nyid la rigs par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, it would be logical for them to be different,

original: phrad pa dang bral ba dag tha dad du mtha' gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phrad pa dang bral ba dag tha dad du mtha' gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because contact and separation are definitely different.

original: de ltar na yang sangs rgyas nyid dang ldan pa zhes par 'gyur gyi sangs rgyas zhes par ni mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na yang sangs rgyas nyid dang ldan pa zhes par 'gyur gyi sangs rgyas zhes par ni mi 'gyur te /
translated: But in that case, it would be “endowed with buddhahood,” not “buddha.”

original: ji ltar ba lan gdang ldan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar ba lan gdang ldan pa bzhin no //
translated: It would be like “endowed with heat,” not “fire.”

original: tha dad med na ni thob pa nyid de thob bya ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad med na ni thob pa nyid de thob bya ma yin no //
translated: If they are not different, then attainment itself is not something to be attained.

original: gang zhig dang tha dad med pa de de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang zhig dang tha dad med pa de de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: That which is not different from something is its very nature.

original: ji ltar me'i tsha ba nyid bzhin no//
analyzed: ji ltar me'i tsha ba nyid bzhin no//
translated: It is like the heat of fire.

original: de'i phyir lam goms pa med pa kho nar sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lam goms pa med pa kho nar sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, without any cultivation of the path, all sentient beings would be buddhas.

original: gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin nyid yin pa de ni mngon du byed pa'i thabs kyi rab tu sbyor ba la 'bad pa med do //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin nyid yin pa de ni mngon du byed pa'i thabs kyi rab tu sbyor ba la 'bad pa med do //
translated: That which is the very nature of something does not require effort to be applied in the method of manifesting it.

original: gal te rang bzhin du gyur kyang kun rdzob tu thog ma med pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin du gyur kyang kun rdzob tu thog ma med pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir /
translated: Even if it were natural, it would be like a nature that is not clear because it is obscured by the beginningless, unreal, and distorted conceptual thought of the relative.

original: rab tu gsal ba dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin dang tha dad pa lta bur 'gyur ro /
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin dang tha dad pa lta bur 'gyur ro /
translated: It would be as if it were different from a nature that is clear.

original: nam mkha'i rab tu gsal ba la sogs pa yang sprin la sogs pas bsgribs pa bzhin no zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rab tu gsal ba la sogs pa yang sprin la sogs pas bsgribs pa bzhin no zhe na ma yin te /
translated: It is like the clarity of the sky, etc., being obscured by clouds, etc.

original: gnyi gar yang chos nyid gcig tu gnas pa nyid kyis bsgrib par bya ba dang sgrib par byed pa dag mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi gar yang chos nyid gcig tu gnas pa nyid kyis bsgrib par bya ba dang sgrib par byed pa dag mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not so, because it is not logical that the obscurer and the obscured are different, since they both abide in the same reality.

original: nor bu la gnas pa'i 'od dang mkhregs ba dag la bsgrib bar bya ba dang sgrib par byed pa nyid ces bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nor bu la gnas pa'i 'od dang mkhregs ba dag la bsgrib bar bya ba dang sgrib par byed pa nyid ces bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The light and hardness of a jewel are not called the obscurer and the obscured.

original: 'gal ba de dag ni chos dang chos can tha dad pa dag kho na la rigs so //
analyzed: 'gal ba de dag ni chos dang chos can tha dad pa dag kho na la rigs so //
translated: Those contradictions are logical only for phenomena and attributes that are different.

original: gang yang bsgribs pa nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi nges pa dang mi ldan pa'i rang bzhin nyid na /
analyzed: gang yang bsgribs pa nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi nges pa dang mi ldan pa'i rang bzhin nyid na /
translated: Also, that which is called “obscured” is the nature of not possessing the certainty of buddhahood.

original: gang zhig gang la nges pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyi gnas pa de ni de la rang gi don bya pa yongs su 'dor ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la nges pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyi gnas pa de ni de la rang gi don bya pa yongs su 'dor ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is not possessed with certainty in regard to something does not abandon its own function in regard to that.

original: sreg pa zhes ma nges kyang sreg byed ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sreg pa zhes ma nges kyang sreg byed ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though it is not certain that it burns, it is not that it does not burn.

original: ji srid byis pa la sogs pa'i lus la gnas shing des des pa dang mi ldan pa'i nor bu dang / sngags dang sman rnams kyang rang gi don bya ba byed do //
analyzed: ji srid byis pa la sogs pa'i lus la gnas shing des des pa dang mi ldan pa'i nor bu dang / sngags dang sman rnams kyang rang gi don bya ba byed do //
translated: As long as it is in the body of a child, etc., even though it is not possessed with certainty, the gem, the mantra, and the medicine perform their own function.

original: gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i don mthong ba sgrib par byed pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i don mthong ba sgrib par byed pa nyid kyis /
translated: Moreover, the obscuration of the correct view of the meaning by the conceptual thoughts

original: mun pa'i tshul nyid la sgrib par byed pa nyid du 'gyur na yang sangs rgyas nyid ni mnyam pa med pa'i snang @6b ba mchog gi tshul nyid las ji ltar bsgrib par bya ba nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: mun pa'i tshul nyid la sgrib par byed pa nyid du 'gyur na yang sangs rgyas nyid ni mnyam pa med pa'i snang @6b ba mchog gi tshul nyid las ji ltar bsgrib par bya ba nyid du 'gyur /
translated: But how can buddhahood, which is the state of supreme, incomparable illumination, be obscured?

original: snang ba ni mun pas bsgrib par bya ba ma yin te snang ba ni mun pa 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba ni mun pas bsgrib par bya ba ma yin te snang ba ni mun pa 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: Light is not obscured by darkness, for light overcomes darkness.

original: gal te yang de ltar yin na nam yang sgrib pa spong ba dang bsgom par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te yang de ltar yin na nam yang sgrib pa spong ba dang bsgom par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: And if that were so, then the obscurations would never be relinquished or cultivated.

original: gang yang dri ma spangs par gyur pa sems kyi bsgrib par bya ba dang / gnyen por 'gyur ba dum bu ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dngos po gcig dang dus gcig la gsum po 'di dag ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang yang dri ma spangs par gyur pa sems kyi bsgrib par bya ba dang / gnyen por 'gyur ba dum bu ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dngos po gcig dang dus gcig la gsum po 'di dag ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //
translated: And how could the relinquishment of the defilements, which is the obscuration of the mind, and the antidote, which is the uncontaminated mind, be a single, indivisible nature at the same time?

original: bdag nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory for something to act on itself.

original: dus tha dad pa nyid la ni shin tu mi rigs te gcig gi dus na gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na de dang de dag thams cad la snying po med de /
analyzed: dus tha dad pa nyid la ni shin tu mi rigs te gcig gi dus na gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na de dang de dag thams cad la snying po med de /
translated: It is quite unreasonable for them to be different in time, because when one exists, the other cannot.

original: gsungs pa'i don rtog ge'i bgrod bya ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsungs pa'i don rtog ge'i bgrod bya ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the statement is not an object of travel for logicians.

original: gsungs pa yang mdo sde rgyan du /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang mdo sde rgyan du /
translated: The statement is also in the Ornament of the Mahāyāna Sūtras:🔽The basis, the indefinite, the nonpervasive,

original: rten dang ma nges ma khyab dang // kun rdzob pa dang skyob can //
analyzed: rten dang ma nges ma khyab dang // kun rdzob pa dang skyob can //
translated: the conventional, and the protector🔽are asserted to be the objects of logicians

original: byis pa la brten rtog ger 'dod //
analyzed: byis pa la brten rtog ger 'dod //
translated: who rely on the childish.

original: de phyir de ni de yul min //🔽zhes so // de nyid gsungs pa ;
analyzed: de phyir de ni de yul min // zhes so // de nyid gsungs pa ;
translated: Therefore, that is not their object.

original: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod par /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod par /
translated: That is also stated in the Śrī Herukābhidhāna:

original: thun mong rgyud rnams thams cad kyi //
analyzed: thun mong rgyud rnams thams cad kyi //
translated: The common tantras

original: gtan tshigs rnams kyis gzhom bya min //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rnams kyis gzhom bya min //
translated: are not to be destroyed by logicians.

original: dad pa tsam gyis gzung bya ste //
analyzed: dad pa tsam gyis gzung bya ste //
translated: They are to be held by faith alone,

original: mig dang lag par ma yin no //
analyzed: mig dang lag par ma yin no //
translated: not by the eye or the hand.

original: zhes so // theg pa chen po'i rgyud bla mar yang //
analyzed: zhes so // theg pa chen po'i rgyud bla mar yang //
translated: And in the Unexcelled Tantra of the Mahāyāna:

original: rang byung rnams kyi don dam la //
analyzed: rang byung rnams kyi don dam la //
translated: The ultimate of the self-arisen

original: dad pa kho nas 'dir 'jug bya //
analyzed: dad pa kho nas 'dir 'jug bya //
translated: is to be entered here only through faith.

original: 'od 'bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: 'od 'bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: The sun's orb, blazing with light,

original: mig med mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig med mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: is not seen by one without eyes.

original: zhes so // sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang //
analyzed: zhes so // sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang //
translated: And the venerable Saraha also says:

original: blo yi spyod yul nyid min ngag gi spyod yul min //
analyzed: blo yi spyod yul nyid min ngag gi spyod yul min //
translated: It is not the domain of the intellect, not the domain of speech.

original: bla mas bstan pa dngos po'i gtam ni ring por 'jug //
analyzed: bla mas bstan pa dngos po'i gtam ni ring por 'jug //
translated: The teacher's instruction is a matter of fact, and it is long-lasting.

original: de ni rim gyis snying rje la sogs yon tan dkar //
analyzed: de ni rim gyis snying rje la sogs yon tan dkar //
translated: It is gradually the good quality of compassion, etc.

original: dad ldan snying gar go 'phang rang nyid sbyin par 'gyur //
analyzed: dad ldan snying gar go 'phang rang nyid sbyin par 'gyur //
translated: It is the faith-endowed heart, the place of the gift of the self.

original: zhes so // de ltar na rig byed la sogs pa'i rab tu 'jug pa yang mi 'gal ba nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes so // de ltar na rig byed la sogs pa'i rab tu 'jug pa yang mi 'gal ba nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the operation of the Vedas, etc. is not contradictory.

original: de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshad mas kyang mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshad mas kyang mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not so, because it is not tenable even by the supramundane valid cognition.

original: 'dir ni de mi srid de /
analyzed: 'dir ni de mi srid de /
translated: Here, that is not possible,

original: bla ma brgyud pa las 'ongs pa'i man ngag gis nyams su myong ba khong du chud pa'i phyir ga la mtshungs //
analyzed: bla ma brgyud pa las 'ongs pa'i man ngag gis nyams su myong ba khong du chud pa'i phyir ga la mtshungs //
translated: because it is understood by the experience of the instruction that has come from the lineage of teachers. How can it be the same?

original: dad pa yang 'dir yod pa nyid dang yon tan can nyid dang nus pa nyid kyis tshad ma'i yid brtan pas yid ches pa dang dang ba dang 'dod pa'i rnam pa ste /🔽gzhan blun po rnams kyis ltar rigs pa @7a * //
analyzed: dad pa yang 'dir yod pa nyid dang yon tan can nyid dang nus pa nyid kyis tshad ma'i yid brtan pas yid ches pa dang dang ba dang 'dod pa'i rnam pa ste / gzhan blun po rnams kyis ltar rigs pa @7a * //
translated: Faith is the mental factor of conviction, clarity, and desire, which is based on the valid knowledge that the Buddha has the three qualities of existence, virtue, and ability.

original: dang bral ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dang bral ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not like the faith of other fools, which is devoid of reason.

original: 'on kyang khas blangs nas kyang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang khas blangs nas kyang brjod par bya ste /
translated: But even though it is accepted, it must be stated.

original: re zhig gang bskyed bya nyid la rnam par 'jig pa nyid du brjod pa de la 'di'i rnam par 'jig cing mar me la sogs pa ltar rgyun zad pa tsam mam /
analyzed: re zhig gang bskyed bya nyid la rnam par 'jig pa nyid du brjod pa de la 'di'i rnam par 'jig cing mar me la sogs pa ltar rgyun zad pa tsam mam /
translated: First, for one who is said to be destroyed while being produced, is it just the exhaustion of the continuum, like a lamp, etc.?

original: sa bon la sogs pa dang myu gu la sogs pa ltar rgyun gzhan skyes pa na sngar gyi rgyun log gam skad cig so sor 'bras bu 'dra pa gzhan dang gzhan skye ba yin /
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa dang myu gu la sogs pa ltar rgyun gzhan skyes pa na sngar gyi rgyun log gam skad cig so sor 'bras bu 'dra pa gzhan dang gzhan skye ba yin /
translated: Or, like a seed, etc., and a sprout, etc., is the previous continuum reversed when another continuum is produced? Or is it that each moment produces another similar effect?

original: re zhig dang po ni ma yin te sems ni brtan ba ltar rnam pa thams cad du 'chad pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: re zhig dang po ni ma yin te sems ni brtan ba ltar rnam pa thams cad du 'chad pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: First, it is not the former, because it is impossible for the mind to be interrupted like a stable thing.

original: mar me la sogs pa la yang nye bar 'tshe ba med pa'i sa phyogs su mar khu dang sdong bu la sogs pa yod na yun ring du gnas pa grub na nam mkha' ltar yangs shing dri ma med pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa la yang nye bar 'tshe ba med pa'i sa phyogs su mar khu dang sdong bu la sogs pa yod na yun ring du gnas pa grub na nam mkha' ltar yangs shing dri ma med pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan
translated: If a lamp, for example, is placed in a place free from disturbance and if oil, wick, etc., are available, it will burn for a long time.🔽

original: pa'i bcom ldan 'das smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: pa'i bcom ldan 'das smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: And if it is established that a lamp, etc. endures for a long time when it is in a place free from harm, and when oil, wick, etc. are present, then what need is there to mention the Blessed One, who is vast like space, who is free from all defilements, who is endowed with the two stores of merit and knowledge?

original: 'jig rten na yang ji srid bsod nams dman pa tsam yod pa de srid sems can rnams kyi rgyun mi 'chad par mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten na yang ji srid bsod nams dman pa tsam yod pa de srid sems can rnams kyi rgyun mi 'chad par mthong ba yin no //
translated: And in the world, as long as there is even a little demerit, sentient beings see it uninterruptedly.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyogs gcig tu gnas pa nyid kyi skyon med de tshogs gnyis kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyogs gcig tu gnas pa nyid kyi skyon med de tshogs gnyis kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of abiding in one place, because he is pervaded by the two stores.

original: phyogs gcig pa nyid la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do //
analyzed: phyogs gcig pa nyid la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do //
translated: And omniscience does not exist in one place.

original: gzhon nu ma'i pra ti se na'i shes pa lta bu dang / bden pa'i rmi lam gyi shes pa ltar dus dang phyogs mtha' dag na gnas pa'i dngos po phyin ci ma log par shes pa rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i pra ti se na'i shes pa lta bu dang / bden pa'i rmi lam gyi shes pa ltar dus dang phyogs mtha' dag na gnas pa'i dngos po phyin ci ma log par shes pa rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The intuition of the bodhisattva is like the intuition of a young girl in her dream, or like the intuition in a true dream, for it knows things as they are in all times and places.

original: de yang phyogs gcig nyid kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang phyogs gcig nyid kho na ma yin te /
translated: And it is not just one part of that intuition,

original: gzhan du na yun ring po dang 'das ba la sogs pa 'ga' zhig rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan du na yun ring po dang 'das ba la sogs pa 'ga' zhig rtogs pa med do //
translated: for otherwise it would not know some things, such as the distant and the past.

original: phyogs gnyis pa yang bcom ldan 'das la mi srid de /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa yang bcom ldan 'das la mi srid de /
translated: The second alternative is not possible for the Lord,

original: 'bras bu mi 'dra ba bskyed pa'i rgyu mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi 'dra ba bskyed pa'i rgyu mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible for a cause to produce effects that are not similar to itself.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa gnyis ni de'i rgyu ste de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis spangs so //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa gnyis ni de'i rgyu ste de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis spangs so //
translated: The two defilements are the cause of that, and the Lord has abandoned them.

original: 'on te de yang mi 'dod pa'i rkyen gyi stobs kyis nyams pa /
analyzed: 'on te de yang mi 'dod pa'i rkyen gyi stobs kyis nyams pa /
translated: But if you do not accept that, then the Lord’s intuition would be impaired by the power of conditions,

original: 'dod pa ma yin zhing rang gi 'dod pa'i dbang gis kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa ma yin zhing rang gi 'dod pa'i dbang gis kyang ma yin te /
translated: and it would not be his own wish,

original: de'i sprul pa'i sku'i rgyun bstan pa la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sprul pa'i sku'i rgyun bstan pa la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be impossible for the stream of his emanation body to continue.

original: gsum pa ni mi 'dod pa ma yin te chang pa med cing rtag pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku la ltos nas bskyed bya nyid kyang 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni mi 'dod pa ma yin te chang pa med cing rtag pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro // de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku la ltos nas bskyed bya nyid kyang 'dod pa'o //
translated: The third is not unacceptable, because it is acceptable in the context of the enjoyment body, which is not a mirage and is an eternal enjoyment.

original: chos kyi sku la ltos nas ni thob bya nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi sku la ltos nas ni thob bya nyid do //
translated: Therefore, in the context of the enjoyment body and the emanation body, the dharma body is the object of attainment.

original: ji ltar brjod pa'i skyon gyi @7b skabs kyang med de /
analyzed: ji ltar brjod pa'i skyon gyi @7b skabs kyang med de /
translated: And there is no occasion for the fault that has been alleged,

original: de ltar yar re zhig gang brjod pa tha dad med pa la thob pa 'gal zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yar re zhig gang brjod pa tha dad med pa la thob pa 'gal zhes pa'o //
translated: because, as has been said, there is no contradiction between the non-difference of the object of attainment and the attainment of it.

original: de la thob pa ni khong du chud pa de lag pas 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la thob pa ni khong du chud pa de lag pas 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Attainment is the understanding of it, not the grasping of it with the hand.

original: de yang dbyer med kyang nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de yang dbyer med kyang nyes pa med do //
translated: And there is no fault in their non-difference.

original: gang zhig gang la gnas shing rang bzhin du gyur pa la yang de gdon mi za bar nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la gnas shing rang bzhin du gyur pa la yang de gdon mi za bar nges pa ma yin te /
translated: And it is not certain that whatever is the basis of something and its nature is the cause of it.

original: ji ltar skad cig 'jig pa la sogs pa la yang ji srid nges par gyur pa de srid ma nges pa nyid du dpyod do //🔽gang yang 'di dag don dam pa'i bden pa la ltos nas sam /
analyzed: ji ltar skad cig 'jig pa la sogs pa la yang ji srid nges par gyur pa de srid ma nges pa nyid du dpyod do // gang yang 'di dag don dam pa'i bden pa la ltos nas sam /
translated: one should analyze the non-ascertainment as long as there is ascertainment.🔽Moreover, one should state whether this is in terms of ultimate truth or

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la ltos nas brjod par bya /
