analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la ltos nas brjod par bya /
translated: in terms of conventional truth.

original: dang po ltar na mi 'dod pa cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: dang po ltar na mi 'dod pa cung zad kyang med do //
translated: In the first case, there is nothing at all that is not accepted.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa la ni thob par bya ba dang thob par byed pa dang thob pa rnams med de /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa la ni thob par bya ba dang thob par byed pa dang thob pa rnams med de /
translated: In ultimate truth, there is no attainment, no attainer, and no objects of attainment,

original: don dam pa'i chos thams cad nye bar dmigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i chos thams cad nye bar dmigs pa med pa'o //
translated: because in ultimate truth, all phenomena are not observed.

original: gnyis pa la ni mngon sum gyis 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni mngon sum gyis 'gal ba'o //
translated: In the second case, there is a contradiction with direct perception,

original: gang gi phyir sems kyi rnam 'gyur las rang gi ngo bo rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa yang rnam pa gzhan du mthong bar 'gyur te ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems kyi rnam 'gyur las rang gi ngo bo rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa yang rnam pa gzhan du mthong bar 'gyur te ;
translated: because the mind, which is established in one way, is seen in another way, in the form of mental images.

original: ji ltar mkhris pa 'khrugs pa'am dha du ra la sogs pa zos pa las rang gi lus la sogs pa 'khor ba med kyang 'khor ba nyid dang / ji ltar yang de'i glo bur gyi 'khrul pa'i rgyu rnam par nyams pa dang rang gi lus la sogs pa rang bzhin du gnas pa la yang thob par brjod cing de thob pa'i ched du thabs kyi rab tu sbyor ba yang byed pa de bzhin du 'dir yang
analyzed: ji ltar mkhris pa 'khrugs pa'am dha du ra la sogs pa zos pa las rang gi lus la sogs pa 'khor ba med kyang 'khor ba nyid dang / ji ltar yang de'i glo bur gyi 'khrul pa'i rgyu rnam par nyams pa dang rang gi lus la sogs pa rang bzhin du gnas pa la yang thob par brjod cing de thob pa'i ched du thabs kyi rab tu sbyor ba yang byed pa de bzhin du 'dir yang
translated: Just as when bile is disturbed or one eats dhātrī and so on, one’s body and so on are not in cyclic existence, still one speaks of being in cyclic existence, and just as when the causes of the adventitious delusion of that [bile] are eliminated, one’s body and so on are naturally at ease, still one speaks of attaining [nirvāṇa] and still one applies the methods for attaining that, in the same way here as well,🔽

original: mi rigs pa ci yod /
analyzed: mi rigs pa ci yod /
translated: Just as when bile is disturbed or one eats dhattura and so on, one’s body and so on do not cycle, yet one speaks of cycling, and just as when the causes of the temporary delusion of that person are eliminated, one speaks of attaining one’s body and so on as they naturally are, and just as one applies methods for the sake of attaining that, what is unreasonable about this?

original: 'di nyid kyi nges pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis kyang yod pa'i don gyis bya ba byed pa nyid du brjod pa spangs pa yin te 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du rigs pa med do //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi nges pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis kyang yod pa'i don gyis bya ba byed pa nyid du brjod pa spangs pa yin te 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du rigs pa med do //
translated: Since this is not ascertained, the meaning of existence is also rejected as being that which performs functions. This is unreasonable in every way.

original: gang yang snang ba ni ji ltar mun pas sgrib bar byed ces pa la sogs pa brjod pa de yang cung zad med de /
analyzed: gang yang snang ba ni ji ltar mun pas sgrib bar byed ces pa la sogs pa brjod pa de yang cung zad med de /
translated: Also, what is said, “How can light be obscured by darkness?” and so on, is completely meaningless.

original: sangs rgyas nyid dang rnam par rtog pa dang / snang ba dang mun pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya'i tshul khyad par med de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid dang rnam par rtog pa dang / snang ba dang mun pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya'i tshul khyad par med de /
translated: Buddhahood, conceptualization, light, and darkness are not different in terms of what is expressed by words.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs bzlog par nus pa'i phyir dang / de rnams kyis bzlog par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / shes bya thams cad khong du chud pa'i rgyud nyid kyis kyang snang ba'i tshul du brjod cing /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs bzlog par nus pa'i phyir dang / de rnams kyis bzlog par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / shes bya thams cad khong du chud pa'i rgyud nyid kyis kyang snang ba'i tshul du brjod cing /
translated: Because the adverse factors can be eliminated, because they cannot eliminate, and because they are expressed in the manner of light by the very continuum that comprehends all objects of knowledge,

original: rnam par rtog pa rnams kyang rtag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa nyid kyis mun pa'i tshul nyid du'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnams kyang rtag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa nyid kyis mun pa'i tshul nyid du'o //
translated: and because conceptualization always adheres to the unreal, it is in the manner of darkness.

original: gal te 'gal ba dag chos can gcig nyid ces ji ltar brjod ce na /
analyzed: gal te 'gal ba dag chos can gcig nyid ces ji ltar brjod ce na /
translated: If it is asked, “How can it be said that opposites are the same basis?”

original: mthong ba la mi @8a * //
analyzed: mthong ba la mi @8a * //
translated: It is not logical to say that.

original: rigs pa ci rtag par 'dzin ba la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa la'ang gnyen po'i phyogs yin gyi chos can du ma nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs pa ci rtag par 'dzin ba la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa la'ang gnyen po'i phyogs yin gyi chos can du ma nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: What is illogical about that? It is illogical to say that the apprehension of permanence and so on are adverse factors and that momentariness and so on are their antidotes, but they are not the same basis.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin skad cig ma nyid la rang gi ngo bo dang ldan par 'dzin pa dang phyin ci log tu gzung ba yang de nyid do //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin skad cig ma nyid la rang gi ngo bo dang ldan par 'dzin pa dang phyin ci log tu gzung ba yang de nyid do //
translated: The nature of mind is momentary, and the grasping of it as having an essence and the grasping of it as erroneous are also just that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa la //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa la //
translated: the nature of mind is pure,

original: dri ma rnams ni glo bur pa'o //
analyzed: dri ma rnams ni glo bur pa'o //
translated: and the stains are adventitious.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: dum bu ma yin pa'i sems gcig la zhes pa ni khyod gang gis bslus par gyur /
analyzed: dum bu ma yin pa'i sems gcig la zhes pa ni khyod gang gis bslus par gyur /
translated: As for the statement “in a single mind that is not a composite,” by whom have you been deceived?

original: rnam par ma dpyad pa'i kun rdzob tu sems ni yid 'phrog pa gcig dang du ma ste de'i chos rnams kyang mang po'o //
analyzed: rnam par ma dpyad pa'i kun rdzob tu sems ni yid 'phrog pa gcig dang du ma ste de'i chos rnams kyang mang po'o //
translated: In the unanalyzed relative, the mind is a single entity that captivates the mind, and its phenomena are many.

original: don dam par ni gcig ma yin zhing du ma yang ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni gcig ma yin zhing du ma yang ma yin no //
translated: In the ultimate, it is neither one nor many.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa du ma'i rnam par spro ba dang / ye shes lnga dang sku gsum dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyang tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa du ma'i rnam par spro ba dang / ye shes lnga dang sku gsum dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyang tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: For that very reason, the emanations in the many forms of the maṇḍalacakra and so on and the phenomena of the five wisdoms, three kāyas, powers, fearlessnesses, and so on are not different.

original: phan tshun ldog pa ma grub pa'i phyir dang / ye shes gcig rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir dang rnal 'byor dang bde ba gcig pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: phan tshun ldog pa ma grub pa'i phyir dang / ye shes gcig rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir dang rnal 'byor dang bde ba gcig pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: because they are not established as mutually exclusive, because they are one consciousness, and because yoga and bliss are one.

original: tha mi dad pa yang ma yin te mtshan nyid tha dad cing don sna tshogs kyi bya ba byed pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yang ma yin te mtshan nyid tha dad cing don sna tshogs kyi bya ba byed pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: They are also not non-different, because they have different characteristics and perform various functions.

original: dngos po don dam pa khas blangs na tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa la sogs pa'i phyogs su lhung ba'i skyon du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dngos po don dam pa khas blangs na tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa la sogs pa'i phyogs su lhung ba'i skyon du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one accepts that things are ultimate, one falls into the error of being biased toward difference or non-difference.🔽But it is not so in the case of the non-establishment of all aspects, like a dream and so on.

original: rmi lam la sogs pa ltar rnam pa thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa la ni ma yin no zhes pa ste ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa ltar rnam pa thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa la ni ma yin no zhes pa ste ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
translated: Enough of this digression.

original: da ni mdor bsdus te brjod pa'i don nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya ba /
analyzed: da ni mdor bsdus te brjod pa'i don nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya ba /
translated: Now, in order to clarify the meaning of the brief statement, it should be explained.

original: gsol ba gdab par bya ba'i phyir yul du gyur pa las thabs kyis bsdus pa'i don gsol ba 'debs pa po rang nyid kyis nye bar bsdus te gsungs pa /
analyzed: gsol ba gdab par bya ba'i phyir yul du gyur pa las thabs kyis bsdus pa'i don gsol ba 'debs pa po rang nyid kyis nye bar bsdus te gsungs pa /
translated: In order to make a request, the object is included by the method, and the one who makes the request, the speaker, is included.

original: nyan par zhes bya ba la sogs par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nyan par zhes bya ba la sogs par gsungs pa'o //
translated: The request is made with please teach the method of yoga and so on.

original: de la thog ma kho nas thabs kyi rgyud kyis bsgom pa'i go rims bstan pa'i phyir dang / rnam par sbyang bar bya ba'i don mdor bsdus pa'i phyir dang / yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar bya ba'i phyir yang bskyed pa'i rim pa la gsol ba btab pa'o //
analyzed: de la thog ma kho nas thabs kyi rgyud kyis bsgom pa'i go rims bstan pa'i phyir dang / rnam par sbyang bar bya ba'i don mdor bsdus pa'i phyir dang / yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar bya ba'i phyir yang bskyed pa'i rim pa la gsol ba btab pa'o //
translated: In that regard, in order to teach the sequence of meditation with the method tantra from the very beginning, in order to summarize the meaning of the object of purification, and in order to clarify the nature of complete purification, the creation stage is requested.

original: bskyed pa zhes pa bskyed pa dang bltam  ba dang skye ba'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa zhes pa bskyed pa dang bltam  ba dang skye ba'o //
translated: The creation is the creation, birth, and generation.

original: de la rab tu sbyor ba 'di @8b yis zhes pa rnal 'byor te de'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de la rab tu sbyor ba 'di @8b yis zhes pa rnal 'byor te de'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: In that regard, this yoga is the yoga that is the characteristic of that.

original: de nas de'i thabs las byung ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: de nas de'i thabs las byung ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: Then, the completion stage arises from that method.

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa dang grub pa dang zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa dang grub pa dang zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
translated: The creation, completion, accomplishment, and union stages.

original: de'i rgyu ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin de rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar btags nas de ltar brjod do //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin de rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar btags nas de ltar brjod do //
translated: The cause of that is the nature of the result of the creation stage, which is called that because the result is metaphorically designated upon the cause.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te rang byin gyis brlab pa dang 'od gsal gyi dbye ba las so //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te rang byin gyis brlab pa dang 'od gsal gyi dbye ba las so //
translated: That also is twofold, from the division of self-consecration and clear light.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni rim pa gnyis la rjes su 'gro'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni rim pa gnyis la rjes su 'gro'o //
translated: Vajra repetition is consistent with the two stages.

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbye ba las rim pa dag ni gnyis kho na'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbye ba las rim pa dag ni gnyis kho na'o //
translated: The stages are just two, from the division of the creation and completion stages.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: rdo rje can gyi chos bstan pa //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi chos bstan pa //
translated: The teaching of the doctrine of the vajri

original: rim pa gnyis la yang dag brten //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis la yang dag brten //
translated: Is well based on the two stages.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni //
translated: The stage of creation itself

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyang ngo //
translated: And the stage of completion itself.

original: zhes so // de'i phyir gtso bo nyid kyis rim pa gnyis po kho na thog mar zhus pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de'i phyir gtso bo nyid kyis rim pa gnyis po kho na thog mar zhus pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the two stages alone are first requested, because of their importance.

original: zhu ba'i lhag ma rnams ni de'i yan lag go //
analyzed: zhu ba'i lhag ma rnams ni de'i yan lag go //
translated: The remaining requests are branches of that.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: rnam pa thams cad gcig sdom la //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad gcig sdom la //
translated: All aspects are summarized in one.

original: zhes pa 'di thams cad kyi rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gcig ste /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di thams cad kyi rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gcig ste /
translated: This is the one kind of analysis of all the aspects.

original: gnyis pa med pa ni sdom pa ste bsdus pa gang yin pa de bzhin du de'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa med pa ni sdom pa ste bsdus pa gang yin pa de bzhin du de'o //
translated: The second, the absence of duality, is the vow, which is the same as the summary.

original: de la zung 'jug ni 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
analyzed: de la zung 'jug ni 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
translated: Therein, union is the result continuum.

original: rang byin gyis brlab pa dang 'od gsal ba dag pa dang de'i yan lag kyang rgyu'i rgyud do //
analyzed: rang byin gyis brlab pa dang 'od gsal ba dag pa dang de'i yan lag kyang rgyu'i rgyud do //
translated: Self-consecration and clear light, and its branches, are the cause continuum.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa yan lag dang bcas pa ni thabs kyi rgyud do //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa yan lag dang bcas pa ni thabs kyi rgyud do //
translated: The creation stage with its branches is the method continuum.🔽After that, these creation and completion stages also are based on the collection of the elements and the derivative elements.

original: de'i rjes la bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'di dag kyang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tshogs la brten pa dag go zhes khams lnga'i mtshan nyid zhus pa /
analyzed: de'i rjes la bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'di dag kyang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tshogs la brten pa dag go zhes khams lnga'i mtshan nyid zhus pa /
translated: The question is asked about the characteristics of the five elements:

original: ji ltar rlung dang me dang chu //
analyzed: ji ltar rlung dang me dang chu //
translated: How are wind, fire, water,🔽earth, and space?

original: zhes pa rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang nam mkha' yang ji ltar te mtshan nyid ji ltar zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang nam mkha' yang ji ltar te mtshan nyid ji ltar zhes pa'o //
translated: How are wind, fire, water, earth, and space? That is, what are their characteristics?

original: 'dir yang tshig 'bru la rab tu rton pa las bzlog ste don la rab tu rton par brjod pa dang / rgyud ni bla ma'i bka' drin gcig pus khong du chud pa nyid du gsal bar bya ba'i phyir rtags la sogs pa bzlog par blta'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang tshig 'bru la rab tu rton pa las bzlog ste don la rab tu rton par brjod pa dang / rgyud ni bla ma'i bka' drin gcig pus khong du chud pa nyid du gsal bar bya ba'i phyir rtags la sogs pa bzlog par blta'o //
translated: Here also, the opposite of relying on the words is stated to be relying on the meaning, and the reversal of the signs, etc. is to be seen as being for the purpose of clarifying that the tantra is to be understood solely through the kindness of the guru.

original: rim pa gnyis ka la yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can gyi lha bsgom par bya'o zhes rnam pa lnga'i mtshan nyid zhus so //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis ka la yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can gyi lha bsgom par bya'o zhes rnam pa lnga'i mtshan nyid zhus so //
translated: In both stages, one should meditate on the deity that has the nature of the five gnoses. Thus, the characteristics of the five are requested.

original: yul drug gi mtshan nyid zhus pa ni bar du chod kyang khams lnga zhus pa'i mthar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yul drug gi mtshan nyid zhus pa ni bar du chod kyang khams lnga zhus pa'i mthar shes par bya'o //
translated: The characteristics of the six objects are requested in the middle, but they should be understood at the end of the request for the five elements.

original: de nas yul drug ces pa yul drug dang yul can gyi yang mtshan nyid ci ste /
analyzed: de nas yul drug ces pa yul drug dang yul can gyi yang mtshan nyid ci ste /
translated: Then, what are the characteristics of the six objects and their subjects?

original: yul gyi @9a * //
analyzed: yul gyi @9a * //
translated: The word “object”

analyzed: sgras 'dir yul can yang ma bzung ste 'brel pa can gyi sgra nyid las so //
translated: here does not refer to the subject as well, because of the word “related.”

analyzed: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang ldan pa'i lha bsgom par bya'o zhes te zhus pa /

original: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab ces pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab ces pa'o //
translated: Blessing of body, speech, and mind.

original: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyi dang nang du rnam par dag pa yang rab tu rtogs par bya'o zhes de zhus pa /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyi dang nang du rnam par dag pa yang rab tu rtogs par bya'o zhes de zhus pa /

analyzed: phyi rol dang ni nang du gnas //

analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug pa ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa las gzhan gyis ma yin zhing de yang lam lnga shes pa med na med la de rnams kyang lus kyi rang bzhin shes pa med na med de /
translated: The stage of generation is the path of the five stages.🔽 The stage of generation is

analyzed: de yang rtsa'i rang bzhin dang grangs med pa dag las ma yin no zhes rim pa gnyis ka'i yan lag tu gyur pa rdo rje'i bzlas pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rim pas zhus pa zla bas nyi ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sequence of the questions about the vajra repetition, etc., which are the limbs of both stages, is the moon to the sun, etc.🔽And in the second stage, the body-aggregate should be accomplished as the identity of body, speech, and mind.🔽 The question about that is how is that body-aggregate?

original: rim pa gnyis pa la'ang lus kyi gong bu'i dngos po lus dang ngag dang sems mnyam pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o zhes de zhus pa lus kyi gong bu de ji ltar zhes lus kyi ste lus 'di'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa la'ang lus kyi gong bu'i dngos po lus dang ngag dang sems mnyam pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o zhes de zhus pa lus kyi gong bu de ji ltar zhes lus kyi ste lus 'di'o //

analyzed: gong bu zhes pa gong bu ni rnam dbye dang bral bar bstan pa ste /

analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ces shes par bya'o //
translated: Its characteristic should be understood.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos nges par tshogs kyi p'u dza bya zhing der dam tshig bsrung ba'i don du brda shes par bya'o zhes de dag zhus pa dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos nges par tshogs kyi p'u dza bya zhing der dam tshig bsrung ba'i don du brda shes par bya'o zhes de dag zhus pa dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The practitioner of the creation stage should definitely perform the gaṇapūjā, and in that, the symbolic language should be understood for the sake of guarding the commitments. The question about those is the commitments, etc.

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo yang 'khor lo nges par bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas kyang phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi gnas la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa dang rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa'i rnam par gzhag pa yang phyi dang nang du shes par bya'o zhes🔽de dag rim gyis zhus pa gnas kyi brda zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo yang 'khor lo nges par bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas kyang phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi gnas la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa dang rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa'i rnam par gzhag pa yang phyi dang nang du shes par bya'o zhes de dag rim gyis zhus pa gnas kyi brda zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The yogi who has ascertained the cakra should also know the external and internal arrangement of the places, etc., and the arrangement of the stages such as the Joyous, etc., externally and internally.

original: gnas la sogs pa'i brda rnams ji tsam zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gnas la sogs pa'i brda rnams ji tsam zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Having asked about them in order, he asks about the symbolic meanings of the places, etc., with “How many are the symbolic meanings of the places, etc.?”🔽The meaning is: “How many are the symbolic meanings of the external places, etc.?”

original: phyi rol gyi gnas la sogs pa bskor ba'i rnal 'byor pa /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gnas la sogs pa bskor ba'i rnal 'byor pa /
translated: The yogi who has circumambulated the external places, etc.,🔽desiring to see the yoginī, will he see her?

original: rnal 'byor ma blta bar 'dod pas de mthong bar 'gyur ram @9b zhes te zhus pa ji ltar mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma blta bar 'dod pas de mthong bar 'gyur ram @9b zhes te zhus pa ji ltar mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: Having asked, “How will the signs be seen?”

original: bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi don du las rab 'byams bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi don du las rab 'byams bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: The yogi who has performed repetition and burnt offering should accomplish the extensive rites for his own benefit.

original: ji ltar khyod kyi las bcu gnyis zhes pa la sogs bcu gnyis po rnams gang ces pa'i don to ;
analyzed: ji ltar khyod kyi las bcu gnyis zhes pa la sogs bcu gnyis po rnams gang ces pa'i don to ;
translated: How are the twelve and so on, meaning what are the twelve?

original: / cho ga dang ldan pa kho na'i sngags bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes sngags bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid zhus so //
analyzed: / cho ga dang ldan pa kho na'i sngags bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes sngags bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid zhus so //
translated: Having asked about the characteristics of mantra recitation, If one recites the mantra endowed with the rite, it will be accomplished, he asks about the rosary.

original: de yang cho ga byas pa kho na'i bgrang phreng gis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bgrang phreng zhus pa ji lta bu'i bgrang phreng rigs zhes pa de bgrang phreng ji lta bu rigs zhes so //
analyzed: de yang cho ga byas pa kho na'i bgrang phreng gis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bgrang phreng zhus pa ji lta bu'i bgrang phreng rigs zhes pa de bgrang phreng ji lta bu rigs zhes so //
translated: And that, only one who has performed the rite should accomplish with the rosary, he asks, What kind of rosary is appropriate? What kind of rosary is appropriate? means What kind of rosary is suitable?

original: bzlas pa nyid kyang sngags kyi mtshan nyid shes pas bya'o zhes de zhus pa /
analyzed: bzlas pa nyid kyang sngags kyi mtshan nyid shes pas bya'o zhes de zhus pa /
translated: Recitation itself should be done by one who knows the characteristics of the mantra, so he asks about that.

original: bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ji tsam zhig ces pa rnam par ji tsam dang / bzlas pa zhes pa bzlas pa'i sngags te de'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ji tsam zhig ces pa rnam par ji tsam dang / bzlas pa zhes pa bzlas pa'i sngags te de'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: How much is the characteristic of recitation? How much means to what extent? Recitation is the mantra to be recited, and that is its characteristic.

original: 'di dag thams cad lha'i rnal 'byor gyis bya'o zhes lha'i rnal 'byor zhus pa /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad lha'i rnal 'byor gyis bya'o zhes lha'i rnal 'byor zhus pa /
translated: All of this should be done with deity yoga, so he asks about deity yoga.

original: ji tsam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji tsam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: How much? and so on.

original: lha'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor las dkyil 'khor gyis 'khor bar bskor nas bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: lha'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor las dkyil 'khor gyis 'khor bar bskor nas bzhugs pa ste /
translated: The yoga of the deity is the mandala circle, which is the abode of the deities.

original: rgyud 'dir ji tsam gyi lha'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir ji tsam gyi lha'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term “mandala” here is the circle of deities.

original: lha'i rnal 'byor yang bsrung ba dang phur bu gdab pa la sogs pa sngags rnams kyis dman pa ma yin no zhes de zhus pa /
analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor yang bsrung ba dang phur bu gdab pa la sogs pa sngags rnams kyis dman pa ma yin no zhes de zhus pa /
translated: The yoga of the deity is not inferior to the mantras of protection, the planting of the dagger, and so on.

original: grub pa'i sngags ni ji ltar blta //
analyzed: grub pa'i sngags ni ji ltar blta //
translated: How should one view the mantra of accomplishment?

original: zhes pa grub pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i sngags ni grub pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa grub pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i sngags ni grub pa'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra that is the cause of accomplishment is the mantra of accomplishment.

original: bgegs dang gral bar bsgom pa'i rgyud nyid las 'dir rnal 'byor ma'i tshul la gnas pas bzlas pa dang bsam gtan mchog gis gzhon nu ma'i mchod pa bya ba dang / de yang tshes gang la dang de la yang chang dang ldan pa'i gtor ma ji ltar dbul bar bya zhes gsum zhus pa'i rim pas gzhon nu ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste gzhon nu ma nyid gzhon nu ma'o //
analyzed: bgegs dang gral bar bsgom pa'i rgyud nyid las 'dir rnal 'byor ma'i tshul la gnas pas bzlas pa dang bsam gtan mchog gis gzhon nu ma'i mchod pa bya ba dang / de yang tshes gang la dang de la yang chang dang ldan pa'i gtor ma ji ltar dbul bar bya zhes gsum zhus pa'i rim pas gzhon nu ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste gzhon nu ma nyid gzhon nu ma'o //
translated: The three questions are answered in the verse beginning with the maiden, etc. The maiden herself is the maiden.

original: ji tsam zhes pa gang la'o //
analyzed: ji tsam zhes pa gang la'o //
translated: How much? means to whom?

original: thams cad kyi tshe 'di nyid kyi bgegs dang bral ba'i don du dam tshig gi ril bu bsten par bya'o zhes bdud rtsi lnga dang lcags kyu lnga zhus so //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe 'di nyid kyi bgegs dang bral ba'i don du dam tshig gi ril bu bsten par bya'o zhes bdud rtsi lnga dang lcags kyu lnga zhus so //
translated: At all times, for the sake of being free from obstacles to this very [practice], one should rely on the pledge pill. Thus, the five nectars and the five hooks are requested.

original: lha'i 'khor lo rgyas par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor bas slob ma rjes su gzung ba la sogs pa'i don du rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba de yang thig gdab pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / @10a * //
analyzed: lha'i 'khor lo rgyas par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor bas slob ma rjes su gzung ba la sogs pa'i don du rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba de yang thig gdab pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / @10a * //
translated: The yogi/nī who meditates extensively on the divine wheel should draw the colored-powder mandala for the sake of taking care of disciples and so forth. That also is preceded by laying out the lines,

original: de yang sa sbyang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / de rnams kyang srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du 'gro ba can no zhes bzhi po rims pas zhus so //
analyzed: de yang sa sbyang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / de rnams kyang srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du 'gro ba can no zhes bzhi po rims pas zhus so //
translated: and that also is preceded by purifying the ground, and those also are preceded by the protection wheel. Thus, the four are asked in order.

original: slob mas ji lta bu bla mar bya zhing des kyang ji lta bu'i slob ma yang dag par bsdu zhes bla ma dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid zhus pa /
analyzed: slob mas ji lta bu bla mar bya zhing des kyang ji lta bu'i slob ma yang dag par bsdu zhes bla ma dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid zhus pa /
translated: The characteristics of the guru and the disciple are asked: “How should the disciple honor the guru? And how should the guru take care of the disciple?”

original: slob dpon zhes pa rnam dbye med pa ni //
analyzed: slob dpon zhes pa rnam dbye med pa ni //
translated: The master is without a case ending.

original: dang po gcig gi tshig gi mtha' can no //
analyzed: dang po gcig gi tshig gi mtha' can no //
translated: It ends in the first case, the nominative.

original: gang gis zhes pa mtshan nyid kyis //
analyzed: gang gis zhes pa mtshan nyid kyis //
translated: “By whom” is by means of characteristics.

original: zhes bar shes par bya ste lhan cig pa'i don la gsum pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bar shes par bya ste lhan cig pa'i don la gsum pa'o //
translated: “Together” is the third case, the instrumental.

original: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur ba ni rgyud nyan pa la sogs pa la dbang ba'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur ba ni rgyud nyan pa la sogs pa la dbang ba'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: The initiation conferred according to the rite is the initiation into listening to the tantra, etc.

original: ji tsam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji tsam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: How much? etc.

original: dbang bskur ba rnam pa du zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba rnam pa du zhes pa'i don to //
translated: means: How many kinds of initiation are there?

original: bzhi pa kho na gtso bo dang 'bras bur gyur pa'o zhes de zhus pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa kho na gtso bo dang 'bras bur gyur pa'o zhes de zhus pa'o //
translated: The fourth is the principal one and is the result, so that is asked about.

original: rnal 'byor pas rang dang gzhan rnams kyis kyang dus dang dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i rtags shes nas nus pa ji ltar ba de bzlog pa la 'bad par bya'o zhes de dag zhus pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas rang dang gzhan rnams kyis kyang dus dang dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i rtags shes nas nus pa ji ltar ba de bzlog pa la 'bad par bya'o zhes de dag zhus pa'o //
translated: The yogi, having understood the signs of timely and untimely death for himself and others, should strive to avert them to the best of his ability, so that is asked about.

original: dus bzhi'i mtshan nyid shes pa ni sngags la sogs pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa nyid de zhes de zhus pa'o //
analyzed: dus bzhi'i mtshan nyid shes pa ni sngags la sogs pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa nyid de zhes de zhus pa'o //
translated: Knowledge of the characteristics of the four times is expertise in accomplishing mantras, etc., so that is asked about.

original: de bzhin du gleng gzhi'i rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa dge ba la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes gleng gzhi gzhag pa zhus pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gleng gzhi'i rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa dge ba la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes gleng gzhi gzhag pa zhus pa'o //
translated: Similarly, expertise in the presentation of the nidana leads to engagement in virtue, so the presentation of the nidana is asked about.

original: dus gang la sngags ji tsam bzlas pas 'grub zhes gsungs pa dus shes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dus gang la sngags ji tsam bzlas pas 'grub zhes gsungs pa dus shes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The question at what time and how much mantra should be recited for accomplishment? is the knowledge of time, etc.

original: drod la sogs pa thob kyang rnal 'byor pa spyod pa dang bral bas mi 'grub po zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: drod la sogs pa thob kyang rnal 'byor pa spyod pa dang bral bas mi 'grub po zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Even if one has attained heat, etc., one does not accomplish [the mantra] without the conduct of a yogi, it is said.

original: spyod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The question what is the conduct? etc.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la sogs pa lhag par mos pa'i dbye bas bstan pa rnam kyi yang grangs nges pa ni rab tu dang pa'i phyir ro zhes te zhus pa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la sogs pa lhag par mos pa'i dbye bas bstan pa rnam kyi yang grangs nges pa ni rab tu dang pa'i phyir ro zhes te zhus pa bzhi pa'o //
translated: The question why is the number of the teachings differentiated by the divisions of faith in Yoginī Tantras, etc.? is the fourth question.

original: rang ngam gzhan gyis byas pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang bral na mchod par mi 'os pa nyid do zhes rab gnas zhus pa'o //
analyzed: rang ngam gzhan gyis byas pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang bral na mchod par mi 'os pa nyid do zhes rab gnas zhus pa'o //
translated: If an image, etc. made by oneself or another is devoid of consecration, it is not worthy of worship, it is said. The question what is consecration? is the fifth question.

original: sngags la sogs pa 'grub pa'i yan lag nyid las sbyin sreg ces te sbyin sreg nyid mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: sngags la sogs pa 'grub pa'i yan lag nyid las sbyin sreg ces te sbyin sreg nyid mchod sbyin no //
translated: The question what is the fire offering? is the sixth question. The fire offering is itself a sacrifice, because it is a limb for the accomplishment of mantras, etc.

original: sbyin sreg la sogs pa las gzhan gyis kyang sngags 'ba' zhig 'grub par byed pa yod do zhes grub pa phra mo don du gnyer bar byed pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir de zhus pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin sreg la sogs pa las gzhan gyis kyang sngags 'ba' zhig 'grub par byed pa yod do zhes grub pa phra mo don du gnyer bar byed pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir de zhus pa'o //
translated: For the sake of some who seek minor accomplishments, he asked about the accomplishment of mere mantras through other means such as fire offerings, etc.

original: rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis skra dkar la sogs pa bzlog par mi nus na sman @10b gyi rab tu sbyor ba bya'o zhes bcud len zhus pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis skra dkar la sogs pa bzlog par mi nus na sman @10b gyi rab tu sbyor ba bya'o zhes bcud len zhus pa'o //
translated: If one cannot prevent gray hair, etc. through the power of yoga, one should employ medicinal preparations, thus he asked about elixirs.

original: yan lag gi dam tshig gi gtso bo nyid las chang btso ba zhus pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag gi dam tshig gi gtso bo nyid las chang btso ba zhus pa'o //
translated: The principal branch commitments are the preparation of beer, thus he asked about that.

original: rna ba phan tshun brgyud pa tsam gyi sngags kyi gug skyed la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro zhes sngags btu ba'i phyir zhus pa gnyis so //🔽sngags rnams kyi 'byung gnas ni 'di las zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba phan tshun brgyud pa tsam gyi sngags kyi gug skyed la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro zhes sngags btu ba'i phyir zhus pa gnyis so // sngags rnams kyi 'byung gnas ni 'di las zhes pa ste /
translated: The mere transmission of mantras from ear to ear will cause the decline of the mantras' curls, etc., thus he asked about the selection of mantras.🔽The source of mantras is from this, thus he asked about the Wheel Array of the Ali Kali, the Source of Mantras.

original: sngags kyi 'byung gnas a'a li k'a li bkod pa'i 'khor lo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sngags kyi 'byung gnas a'a li k'a li bkod pa'i 'khor lo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of Wheel Array of the Ali Kali, the Source of Mantras is as follows.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pas kyang tshar bcad pa dang rjes su bzung bas kyang 'ga' zhig gdul bar bya'o zhes de dag zhus pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pas kyang tshar bcad pa dang rjes su bzung bas kyang 'ga' zhig gdul bar bya'o zhes de dag zhus pa'o //
translated: One who abides in the stage of generation should also subdue and favor some disciples with the mantra of hum and the mantra of phat.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni de kho na sgom pa rnams kyis te gzhan gyis ma yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni de kho na sgom pa rnams kyis te gzhan gyis ma yin no //
translated: The power of the great seal is for those who meditate on reality, not for others.

original: de kho na'ang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na'ang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o //
translated: And that reality is the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.🔽And emptiness is also twofold.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa gnyis so zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa rgyas par bya ba'i don du bzhi po rim pas zhus pa ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa gnyis so zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa rgyas par bya ba'i don du bzhi po rim pas zhus pa ste /
translated: In order to elaborate on the stage of completion, he asks the four questions in sequence:

original: de nyid rnams zhes pa bdag gi de kho na la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi nyid las mtshan nyid ces 'brel par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rnams zhes pa bdag gi de kho na la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi nyid las mtshan nyid ces 'brel par bya'o //
translated: Those realities refers to the four types of reality, such as the reality of the self, and so on. The characteristic is to be connected.

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag la yang ji ltar dbye rmed pas bsgom zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag la yang ji ltar dbye rmed pas bsgom zhes gsungs pa /
translated: And in emptiness and compassion, how should one meditate, asking about the divisions?

original: chos rnams thams cad yongs shes pa'i //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad yongs shes pa'i //
translated: The verse says, Fully knowing all phenomena,

original: rgyur gyur pa'i sgom pa de chos thams cad bsgom pa se de'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu bshad du gsol lo //
analyzed: rgyur gyur pa'i sgom pa de chos thams cad bsgom pa se de'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu bshad du gsol lo //
translated: Please explain the characteristics of that meditation which is the cause, and of the meditation on all phenomena.

original: zhu ba gzhan ni med de 'di dag kho nas rim pa gnyis yan lag dang bcas pa rdzogs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhu ba gzhan ni med de 'di dag kho nas rim pa gnyis yan lag dang bcas pa rdzogs so zhes pa'o //
translated: There is no other request, but these alone complete the two stages with their branches.

original: skabs su bab pa snod kyi mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i don yang de nyid las zhus pa nyid do //
analyzed: skabs su bab pa snod kyi mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i don yang de nyid las zhus pa nyid do //
translated: The meaning of the characteristics of the vessel and so forth that are relevant here are also requested in just those [verses].

original: de ltar don drug cu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyis gsol ba gdab pa'i sgo nas nye bar bsdus pa las /
analyzed: de ltar don drug cu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyis gsol ba gdab pa'i sgo nas nye bar bsdus pa las /
translated: Thus, having been summarized by way of the sixty-two topics of request,

original: 'di tsam kho na'i don bshad par bya'o zhes pa rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don bstan te zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di tsam kho na'i don bshad par bya'o zhes pa rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don bstan te zhes pa'o //
translated: [the Bhagavān] teaches the summarized meaning of the tantra, saying, The meaning of just this much should be explained.

original: le'u dang po'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u dang po'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the first chapter.

original: // /'di nas brtsams te gsungs pa'i zhu ba rnams kyi don rim pas bstan pa'i phyir le'u gnyis pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi mthar thug pa ni gzhung ngo //
analyzed: // /'di nas brtsams te gsungs pa'i zhu ba rnams kyi don rim pas bstan pa'i phyir le'u gnyis pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi mthar thug pa ni gzhung ngo //
translated: From here onward, in order to teach the meaning of the statements that were made in sequence, the thirty-three chapters beginning with the second chapter are the text.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa zhes pa sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa zhes pa sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
translated: In this regard, the Bhagavat said is the words of the compiler.

original: legs so legs so zhes pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par gsol ba btab pa nyid kyis phyag na rdo rje la bsngags pa'o //
analyzed: legs so legs so zhes pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par gsol ba btab pa nyid kyis phyag na rdo rje la bsngags pa'o //
translated: Excellent, excellent is the praise of Vajrapāṇi by the request itself, Please explain completely.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That itself is said:🔽Secret is the praise of the request, Please explain completely the meaning that is not the domain of all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: @11a * // gsang ba zhes pa ste gang las khyod nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mtha' dag gi spyod yul ma yin pa'i don rdzogs par zhu ba zhes bsngags pa'i rim pas skabs kyi don bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: @11a * // gsang ba zhes pa ste gang las khyod nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mtha' dag gi spyod yul ma yin pa'i don rdzogs par zhu ba zhes bsngags pa'i rim pas skabs kyi don bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the meaning of the context, it is said:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, and so on.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni bar ma chad pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni bar ma chad pa'i don to //
translated: The word then means without interruption.

original: 'di las zhes pa mgo 'di las le'u'i mthar thug pa bskyed pa'i rim pa bshad par bya'i zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: 'di las zhes pa mgo 'di las le'u'i mthar thug pa bskyed pa'i rim pa bshad par bya'i zhes 'brel lo //
translated: Here means from here up to the end of the chapter, the stage of generation will be explained.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni skye gnas bzhi dang chos mthun pas de rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / lus dang ngag dang sems dben pa'i rim pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i phyir yang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni skye gnas bzhi dang chos mthun pas de rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / lus dang ngag dang sems dben pa'i rim pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i phyir yang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the creation stage because it is the purification of the four birth processes, and because it is the entry to the completion stage by way of the stages of body, speech, and mind isolation.

original: de'i phyir skye gnas de rnams kho na rim pas ston pa bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir skye gnas de rnams kho na rim pas ston pa bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that “the birth processes are taught in order.”

original: de las zla ba dang nyi ma las sa bon dang mtshan ma'i rim pas rdzogs pa'i lha ni skye gnas sgo nga las skyes pa'o//
analyzed: de las zla ba dang nyi ma las sa bon dang mtshan ma'i rim pas rdzogs pa'i lha ni skye gnas sgo nga las skyes pa'o//
translated: From that, the complete deity by way of the seed and sign from the moon and sun is the birth process of the egg.

original: yab dang yum gyi rdo rje dang padma bsrubs pas zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems las 'thon pa ni skye gnas mngal las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: yab dang yum gyi rdo rje dang padma bsrubs pas zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems las 'thon pa ni skye gnas mngal las skyes pa'o //
translated: The one arisen from the melted bodhicitta from the churning of the father’s vajra and the mother’s lotus is the birth process of the womb.

original: zla ba dang sa bon tsam las skyes pa ni skye gnas drod gsher las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang sa bon tsam las skyes pa ni skye gnas drod gsher las skyes pa'o //
translated: The one arisen from the moon and the seed alone is the birth process of heat and moisture.

original: spro ba ni skye gnas drod gsher las skyes pa'o zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: spro ba ni skye gnas drod gsher las skyes pa'o zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say that emanation is the birth process of spontaneous presence.

original: sa bon la sogs pa dang bral bas skad cig la 'od gsal las skyes pa ni skye gnas rdzus te skyes pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa dang bral bas skad cig la 'od gsal las skyes pa ni skye gnas rdzus te skyes pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from seeds and so forth, it is born from clear light in an instant, and is born supernaturally.

original: skye gnas rdzus te skyes pa nyid zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa dang brtag pa rdzogs pa'i rim par yang rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: skye gnas rdzus te skyes pa nyid zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa dang brtag pa rdzogs pa'i rim par yang rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should also arrange the profound creation stage and the perfection stage of analysis in the supernatural birth.

original: gang yang sman pa snying rje dang ldan pa ni gzhan gyi yang 'chi 'pho ba la nad gzhi dang bcas pa nye bar bstan nas /
analyzed: gang yang sman pa snying rje dang ldan pa ni gzhan gyi yang 'chi 'pho ba la nad gzhi dang bcas pa nye bar bstan nas /
translated: Moreover, a compassionate physician, having taught the transference of another's consciousness along with the disease,

original: sman nye bar bstan pa ltar thog mar kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum kho na nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: sman nye bar bstan pa ltar thog mar kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum kho na nye bar bstan to //
translated: teaches the medicine. In the same way, first the three afflictions are taught.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' gang yin //
analyzed: gzhan yang / mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' gang yin //
translated: Whatever is the limit of nirvana,

original: 'khor ba dag gi mtha' yang ste //🔽de dag khyad par phra mo yang //
analyzed: 'khor ba dag gi mtha' yang ste // de dag khyad par phra mo yang //
translated: That is the limit of samsara.🔽There is not the slightest difference

original: cung zad yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: cung zad yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Between them, even the most subtle.

original: zhes pa'i tshul las yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin kho na thog mar bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshul las yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin kho na thog mar bstan te /
translated: In this way, the completely pure nature is taught first.

original: yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin shin tu nges pa na dri ma dang bral ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin shin tu nges pa na dri ma dang bral ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: When the nature of complete purity is ascertained, it is the complete purity free from stains.

original: de gsungs pa dpal brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyal por /
analyzed: de gsungs pa dpal brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyal por /
translated: That is stated in the glorious King of Tantras with Two Sections:

original: chos 'di rnams ni mya @11b ngan 'das //
analyzed: chos 'di rnams ni mya @11b ngan 'das //
translated: These phenomena are nirvana.

original: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gti mug las //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gti mug las //
translated: The nature of samsara is ignorance.

original: rmongs med 'khor ba dag pa ste //
analyzed: rmongs med 'khor ba dag pa ste //
translated: Without delusion, samsara is pure.

original: 'khor ba la ni mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: 'khor ba la ni mya ngan 'das //
translated: Samsara is nirvana.

original: zhes so // gal te chos bstan pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling las gling gzhan na'ang yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes so // gal te chos bstan pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling las gling gzhan na'ang yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If this teaching of the dharma exists in other continents besides Jambudvipa,

original: gal te med na ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te med na ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: if it does not exist, how is it?🔽It is said:

original: shar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽longs spyod chen pos yang dag 'tsho //
analyzed: shar zhes pa la sogs pa'o // longs spyod chen pos yang dag 'tsho //
translated: In the east, etc.🔽One should live by the great enjoyment.

original: zhes pa longs spyod chen pos yang dag par 'tsho bar 'gyur pa'i las kyis yang dag par 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa longs spyod chen pos yang dag par 'tsho bar 'gyur pa'i las kyis yang dag par 'tsho ba'o //
translated: One should live by the great enjoyment, living by the karma of the great enjoyment.

original: blun pa rang nyid sgrub pa dang sel ba la rmongs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blun pa rang nyid sgrub pa dang sel ba la rmongs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because fools are confused about their own accomplishment and removal,

original: rmongs pa gzhan gyis brjod pa'i don 'dzin mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rmongs pa gzhan gyis brjod pa'i don 'dzin mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: because the confused are unable to grasp the meaning expressed by others,

original: de dag nyid bye brag mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid bye brag mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Those are not differentiated.🔽How is it in the Rose Apple Land?

original: 'dzam bu'i gling rnams na ji lta zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling rnams na ji lta zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: 'dzam bu'i gling zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the Rose Apple Land, etc.

original: gcig gi tshig mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: gcig gi tshig mang po'i tshig go //
translated: The word “one” is a plural word.

original: yang na gling bzhi pa gzhan gyi 'dzam bu gling la ltos pas so //
analyzed: yang na gling bzhi pa gzhan gyi 'dzam bu gling la ltos pas so //
translated: Or, in relation to the Rose Apple Land of another four-continent world system.

original: las kyis zhes pa legs byas dang nyes byas kyi las rnams kyi gnas te /
analyzed: las kyis zhes pa legs byas dang nyes byas kyi las rnams kyi gnas te /
translated: The abode of good and bad actions is the Rose Apple Land.

original: gling gzhan rnams ni phal cher rnam smin gyi 'bras bu longs spyod pa'i sa'o //
analyzed: gling gzhan rnams ni phal cher rnam smin gyi 'bras bu longs spyod pa'i sa'o //
translated: The other continents are lands for enjoying the results of evolution.

original: las kyi rnam par dbye ba ston pa /🔽legs byas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: las kyi rnam par dbye ba ston pa / legs byas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The classification of actions is taught.

original: legs byas dang nyes byas kyang so sor rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: legs byas dang nyes byas kyang so sor rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Good and bad actions are each of three kinds.🔽The land for enjoying the results of evolution, the natural and dominant results, is this Rose Apple Land.

original: phal cher gyi rgyu mthun pa dang dbang gi 'bras bu longs spyod pa'i sa ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'o zhes gsungs pa skye ba snga ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phal cher gyi rgyu mthun pa dang dbang gi 'bras bu longs spyod pa'i sa ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'o zhes gsungs pa skye ba snga ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The teaching on the former birth, etc., is stated.

original: ji ltar 'di kho na las kyi sa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar 'di kho na las kyi sa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is this the level of karma?

original: rgyags pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'di kho nar mi bzad pa'i rgyags pa dang ser sna dang gdug pa'i sems dang g-yo dang sgyu dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang rga ba dang na ba rnams kyis gzir ba'o
analyzed: rgyags pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'di kho nar mi bzad pa'i rgyags pa dang ser sna dang gdug pa'i sems dang g-yo dang sgyu dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang rga ba dang na ba rnams kyis gzir ba'o
translated: It is said: “Here, there is unbearable intoxication, stinginess, a malicious mind, deceit, fraud, conceit, passion, hatred, delusion, old age, and disease.”

original: // gal te 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams la yang ci thams cad du 'di ma bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: // gal te 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams la yang ci thams cad du 'di ma bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is asked, “Are not all the people of Jambudvīpa also like this?” it is said:

original: 'dzam bu'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste dbus kyi yul du skyes pa ste zhes pa ni yul dbus su skyes pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste dbus kyi yul du skyes pa ste zhes pa ni yul dbus su skyes pa la'o //
translated: “Those born in the middle country” means those born in the middle country.

original: 'di yang sngon gyi dge ba'i las la ltos pas sems can rnam pa gsum ste /🔽rtul po dang bar ma dang rnon po'i dbye ba las so zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di yang sngon gyi dge ba'i las la ltos pas sems can rnam pa gsum ste / rtul po dang bar ma dang rnon po'i dbye ba las so zhes gsungs pa /
translated: This also depends on previous virtuous karma, so there are three types of sentient beings:🔽those of dull faculties, those of middling faculties, and those of sharp faculties.

original: rtul zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtul zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said:🔽“The dull, the middling, and the sharp.”

original: nye bar bsdu ba gsungs @12a * //
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba gsungs @12a * //
translated: The summary is stated:

original: pa ; mi ru zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pa ; mi ru zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The human and so on.

original: de'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par grol ba'i mi'i skye ba thob pa dang / khyim nas nges par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa zhes pa ste ;
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par grol ba'i mi'i skye ba thob pa dang / khyim nas nges par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa zhes pa ste ;
translated: Therefore, having obtained a human birth in Jambudvipa, free from the eight unfavorable conditions, leaving the household life, going forth in the doctrine of the Tathagata, and attaining samadhi,

original: ji ltar mchog gi gter rnyed pa ltar shin tu rnyed par dka' zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mchog gi gter rnyed pa ltar shin tu rnyed par dka' zhes pa'o //
translated: it is said that one should strive for the supreme goal, as if one has found a supreme treasure, which is extremely difficult to obtain.

original: gal te bskal pa dang po pa dang bar do'i srid pa dang dngos po'i yul la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams ma grol ba ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te bskal pa dang po pa dang bar do'i srid pa dang dngos po'i yul la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams ma grol ba ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If those endowed with the qualities of the first eon, intermediate existence, objects of existence, and so on are not liberated, how is it? It is said:

original: sgyu ma lta bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Like an illusion and so on.

original: des na sngon byas las zhes pa rgyu des na sngon byas pa'i las kyis 'pho ba dang skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na sngon byas las zhes pa rgyu des na sngon byas pa'i las kyis 'pho ba dang skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by that cause, by karma previously done, one will be reborn.

original: 'phos nas bar do'i srid par dus ji tsam ji ltar gnas shing de las ji ltar yang 'gro ba gzhan du nying mtshams sbyor ba rnyed ce na rim pas ston pa /
analyzed: 'phos nas bar do'i srid par dus ji tsam ji ltar gnas shing de las ji ltar yang 'gro ba gzhan du nying mtshams sbyor ba rnyed ce na rim pas ston pa /
translated: Having transmigrated, for how long and in what way does one abide in the intermediate existence, and how does one connect to another existence?

original: tshogs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste tshogs pa ni skye ba'i rgyu mtha' dag ste /
analyzed: tshogs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste tshogs pa ni skye ba'i rgyu mtha' dag ste /
translated: The collection is the totality of the causes of birth.

original: ji srid ma tshogs pa de srid zhag bdun bdun las 'phos nas yang dang yang skyes te de nyid du gnas so //
analyzed: ji srid ma tshogs pa de srid zhag bdun bdun las 'phos nas yang dang yang skyes te de nyid du gnas so //
translated: As long as the collection is not complete, one transmigrates for seven days, and again and again is born and abides there.

original: der gnas pa'i gzugs ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: der gnas pa'i gzugs ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the form of one who abides there?

original: srid pa'i skye bo can du mthong //
analyzed: srid pa'i skye bo can du mthong //
translated: One sees the one who has the existence of birth.

original: zhes pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa bzhin no //
translated: One is like the existence of birth.

original: shin tu nges par kun dga'i stobs //
analyzed: shin tu nges par kun dga'i stobs //
translated: One is very certain, the power of universal delight.

original: zhes pa bya ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes pa bya ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: This is the particular action.🔽One enters by the path of the mouth.

original: kha yi lam la rab tu 'jug / ces pa kha'i lam gyis rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: kha yi lam la rab tu 'jug / ces pa kha'i lam gyis rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: One enters by the path of the mouth.

original: 'o na bar do'i srid pa nyid na ji ltar 'pho zhing skye bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na bar do'i srid pa nyid na ji ltar 'pho zhing skye bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Well then, how does one transmigrate and be born in the intermediate existence itself?

original: rta zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rta zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, “horse,” and so on.

original: rta zhon pa ni rta la zhon pa zhes pa ste de ltar shes pa rlung la zhon pa ni bzhon pa la bzhin no //
analyzed: rta zhon pa ni rta la zhon pa zhes pa ste de ltar shes pa rlung la zhon pa ni bzhon pa la bzhin no //
translated: Riding a horse is called “mounting a horse,” and in the same way, consciousness riding on the wind is like [riding] a mount.

original: de'i phyir gang du gcig yod pa der lhag ma'o zhes pa'i rim pa las shes pa'i rang bzhin lus 'grub pa'i rgyu yod ces dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang du gcig yod pa der lhag ma'o zhes pa'i rim pa las shes pa'i rang bzhin lus 'grub pa'i rgyu yod ces dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, where one exists, the rest exist, and in that order. The meaning is that the cause of the body, which is the nature of consciousness, exists.

original: yang na pha'i dbugs rab tu rgyu ba'i rlung la brten nas 'jug go zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang na pha'i dbugs rab tu rgyu ba'i rlung la brten nas 'jug go zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Or, the meaning is that it enters in dependence on the wind of the father’s respiration.

original: ji ltar 'jug pa mi shes so zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jug pa mi shes so zhes gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that one does not know how it enters.

original: shin tu myur bar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu myur bar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The root text] states, “Extremely quickly . . .”

original: nyi ma'i 'od zer phog pas me shel dang ras bal la me 'bar ba bzhin zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od zer phog pas me shel dang ras bal la me 'bar ba bzhin zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that it is like a fire burning on a sun-crystal or cotton by the rays of the sun.

original: skad cig gang la rab tu 'jug ci na gsungs pa /
analyzed: skad cig gang la rab tu 'jug ci na gsungs pa /
translated: In what instant does it enter? It is said, “In two . . .”

original: gnyis dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste gang gi che rtsa'i 'khor lo bskul te /
analyzed: gnyis dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste gang gi che rtsa'i 'khor lo bskul te /
translated: The meaning is that it is the instant when the channel-wheels are activated.

original: @12b zla ba dang nyi ma zhu bar byas pa mchog tu dga' ba yang dag par 'thob pa'i skad cig de la zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: @12b zla ba dang nyi ma zhu bar byas pa mchog tu dga' ba yang dag par 'thob pa'i skad cig de la zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “at the moment of attaining supreme joy by the moon and sun melting” is that.

original: thig le'i gzugs kyis zhes pa nam mkha'i gzugs kyis so //
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs kyis zhes pa nam mkha'i gzugs kyis so //
translated: “In the form of a drop” means in the form of space.

original: nur nur po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na'ang phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i rgyu ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can de bzhin gshegs pa lngar byin gyis brlabs pa yod do zhes ston pa /
analyzed: nur nur po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na'ang phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i rgyu ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can de bzhin gshegs pa lngar byin gyis brlabs pa yod do zhes ston pa /
translated: Even in the state of the kalala and so forth, there is the consecration of the five aggregates as the five Tathagatas, who are the nature of the five pristine awarenesses, the cause of the purification of the five aggregates.

original: nur nur po zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'di dag rnam par dag pa nyid rnam pa lnga bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: nur nur po zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'di dag rnam par dag pa nyid rnam pa lnga bsgom pa'o //
translated: In order to teach this, it says “kalala” and so forth. These are the five aspects of the meditation on the purification.

original: nur nur po zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nur nur po zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Kalala” and so forth.

original: nur nur po ni khams gnyis 'dres par gyur pa 'dred pa'o //
analyzed: nur nur po ni khams gnyis 'dres par gyur pa 'dred pa'o //
translated: Kalala is the mixture of the two constituents, which is fluid.

original: mer mer po zhes pa lbu ba'i rnam pa nang stong pa chu'i chu bur lta bu'o //
analyzed: mer mer po zhes pa lbu ba'i rnam pa nang stong pa chu'i chu bur lta bu'o //
translated: Arbuda is the form of foam, which is hollow inside, like a water bubble.

original: ltar ltar po zhes pa nur nur po nyid cung zad mkhregs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ltar ltar po zhes pa nur nur po nyid cung zad mkhregs par gyur pa'o //
translated: Peshi is the slight hardening of the kalala.

original: gor gor po zhes pa sha lta bu ste pags pa shin tu 'jam pa dang ldan pa nyid las so //
analyzed: gor gor po zhes pa sha lta bu ste pags pa shin tu 'jam pa dang ldan pa nyid las so //
translated: The “embryo” is like flesh, because it has very soft skin.

original: mkhrang 'gyur zhes pa mgo dang lag pa dang rkang pa'i rgyur gyur pa lnga rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: mkhrang 'gyur zhes pa mgo dang lag pa dang rkang pa'i rgyur gyur pa lnga rgyas pa ste /
translated: The “hardening” is the growth of the five parts that are the cause of the head, arms, and legs.

original: slar yang der dri chu dang khrag dang khu ba rnams so //🔽gong bu tsam zhes pa ro la sogs pa rnams 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang der dri chu dang khrag dang khu ba rnams so // gong bu tsam zhes pa ro la sogs pa rnams 'dus pa'o //
translated: Again, there are urine, blood, and semen there.🔽The “lump” is the collection of tastes, etc.

original: 'dres pa zhes pa dri chen te mi bskyod pa la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pha'o //
analyzed: 'dres pa zhes pa dri chen te mi bskyod pa la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pha'o //
translated: The “mixture” is feces, consecrated by Akṣobhya, etc.

original: 'di rnams kyis mngal skyes kyi rim pa rnam par bshad nas /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis mngal skyes kyi rim pa rnam par bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the stages of womb birth,

original: yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin dang khu ba dang khrag dag gi rten gsungs pa /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin dang khu ba dang khrag dag gi rten gsungs pa /
translated: he teaches the nature of the pure semen and blood:

original: rtsa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste skye gnas dbus su ni zhes pa lte ba'i 'og gnas su'o //
analyzed: rtsa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste skye gnas dbus su ni zhes pa lte ba'i 'og gnas su'o //
translated: “Two channels” and so on. In the middle of the birthplace means in the place below the navel.

original: de dag ces pa rtsa dag ste /
analyzed: de dag ces pa rtsa dag ste /
translated: Those means the channels.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid ces pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid ces pa /
translated: The nature of the dharmadhātu means

original: aa ba dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin las so //
analyzed: aa ba dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin las so //
translated: from the nature of the avadhūti.

original: mngal du 'jug pa'i rim pa gsungs pa las zhes pa la sogs pa las nyid sa bon te bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid las so //
analyzed: mngal du 'jug pa'i rim pa gsungs pa las zhes pa la sogs pa las nyid sa bon te bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid las so //
translated: The seed is the cause of generation.

original: de dang chos mthun pa'i rlung gis yongs su bsgyur zhing kha thur du byas nas chos 'byung gi sgo la mngon du phyogs par 'khrid par 'gyur te skye bar 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dang chos mthun pa'i rlung gis yongs su bsgyur zhing kha thur du byas nas chos 'byung gi sgo la mngon du phyogs par 'khrid par 'gyur te skye bar 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The wind that is similar to that turns it over and, facing down, it is led to the door of the bhaga, which means it is born.

original: dri za'i sems can ni skyes par 'gyur na nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dus su pha la phrag dog gis rab tu 'jug ste /
analyzed: dri za'i sems can ni skyes par 'gyur na nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dus su pha la phrag dog gis rab tu 'jug ste /
translated: If the gandharva being is to be born male, it enters through jealousy of the father at the time of conception.

original: bud med ni ma la'o //
analyzed: bud med ni ma la'o //
translated: If it is to be born female, it is through jealousy of the mother.

original: de'i phyir de'i skyes pa mngal du ma'i rgyab la mngon du phyogs par gnas la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i skyes pa mngal du ma'i rgyab la mngon du phyogs par gnas la /
translated: Therefore, the male being in the womb abides facing the back of the mother.

original: bud med ni bzlog ba yis so zhes ston pa g-yas pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽de dag rtags @13a * //
analyzed: bud med ni bzlog ba yis so zhes ston pa g-yas pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o // de dag rtags @13a * //
translated: The female being abides facing the front.🔽The signs of that are taught.

original: kyis shes par ston pa sa bon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kyis shes par ston pa sa bon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The seed is the cause of generation.

original: las zhes pa la sogs pa rtag tu 'gyur zhes pa'i bar zhar la 'phros pa'o //
analyzed: las zhes pa la sogs pa rtag tu 'gyur zhes pa'i bar zhar la 'phros pa'o //
translated: The section from “action” up to “always changing” is an aside.

original: lus ni pha ma'i khams gnyis las skyes pa'o zhes de gnyis rgyu mthun pa'i rnam par dbye bas ston pa /
analyzed: lus ni pha ma'i khams gnyis las skyes pa'o zhes de gnyis rgyu mthun pa'i rnam par dbye bas ston pa /
translated: The body is born from the two elements of the parents. The author shows that those two are the cause by the analysis of the result resembling the cause.

original: chu khams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chu khams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The “water element” and so on.

original: nye bar sdud pa de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nye bar sdud pa de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The summary is “Thus” and so on.

original: drug bsdus pa'i phung po rnams la byung ba ni drug bsdus lus can no //
analyzed: drug bsdus pa'i phung po rnams la byung ba ni drug bsdus lus can no //
translated: The body that is included in the six is the embodied one included in the six.

original: lus byung zhes klog pa la yang don de nyid do //
analyzed: lus byung zhes klog pa la yang don de nyid do //
translated: If one reads “body arisen,” the meaning is the same.

original: phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyang 'di zhes ston pas gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyang 'di zhes ston pas gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The author shows that the five aggregates are also “this” by “form” and so on.

original: 'di dag thams cad rtogs pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad rtogs pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: The result of understanding all of this is stated.

original: skye bo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: skye bo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The people” and so on.

original: skye bo skye ba zhes pa srid pa 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo skye ba zhes pa srid pa 'grub pa'o //
translated: “The people are born” means the establishment of existence.

original: shes pa zhes pa shes nas so //
analyzed: shes pa zhes pa shes nas so //
translated: “Knowing” means having understood.

original: 'dis ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa ltar skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i dngos po rnams ngar 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i gnas ma yin par gsal bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa ltar skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i dngos po rnams ngar 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i gnas ma yin par gsal bar bstan to //
translated: This clearly shows that things that arise, endure, and perish, like illusions and dreams, are not the basis of the apprehension of the “I” and so on.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:🔽Whatever is emanated by an illusion,

original: gang yang sgyu mas sprul pa dang // sgyu rnams kyis ni gang sprul pa //
analyzed: gang yang sgyu mas sprul pa dang // sgyu rnams kyis ni gang sprul pa //
translated: and whatever is emanated by magicians,🔽where do they come from,

original: de ni gang nas 'ongs pa dang // gang du 'gro zhes brtag par bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni gang nas 'ongs pa dang // gang du 'gro zhes brtag par bya // zhes gsungs so //
translated: and where do they go?

original: de nyid kyi phyir shes pa kho na sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir shes pa kho na sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu'o //
translated: Therefore, consciousness itself is the cause of buddhahood.

original: de ltar yang tsar pa ti'i zhabs kyis /
analyzed: de ltar yang tsar pa ti'i zhabs kyis /
translated: Thus, the venerable Cārasa says:

original: sgyu ma nyid ces bstan pa gang gi blo //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid ces bstan pa gang gi blo //
translated: The mind that is taught to be “illusion-like”

original: de yi dngos po 'ching byed ma yin te /
analyzed: de yi dngos po 'ching byed ma yin te /
translated: is not bound by the things of this world.

original: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa nyer zhi'i blo //
analyzed: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa nyer zhi'i blo //
translated: The mind that is pacified of existence and of nirvana

original: de ni gnyis med grub pa'i snod du 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni gnyis med grub pa'i snod du 'gyur //
translated: becomes the vessel of the accomplishment of nonduality.

original: zhes so // le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zhes so // le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the second chapter of the Bodhicaryāvatāra.

original: // / rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhus pa'i lan gdab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhus pa'i lan gdab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to respond to the question about the completion stage, he says:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: rim pa gnyis ka la'ang phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi 'khor lo kho na sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can des bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis ka la'ang phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi 'khor lo kho na sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can des bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: In both stages, one should meditate on the wheel of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases, which is just the nature of the three bodies.🔽He says that:

original: lus kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The body, etc.

original: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa la yam yig la sogs pa las skyes pa rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa la yam yig la sogs pa las skyes pa rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i rim pas /
translated: In the generation stage, the wind mandala, etc., which arise from the syllable yaṃ, etc.,

original: ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang gi nang na gnas pa'i lha'i 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / bdud rtsi myang ba'i mthar thug pas sprul pa'i @13b sku'o ;
analyzed: ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang gi nang na gnas pa'i lha'i 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / bdud rtsi myang ba'i mthar thug pas sprul pa'i @13b sku'o ;
translated: are the nirmāṇakāya, since they are the offering and praise of the wheel of deities residing in the celestial mansion on top of Mount Meru, which culminates in the tasting of elixir.

original: /'od gsal la rab tu zhugs pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: /'od gsal la rab tu zhugs pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The dharmakāya is the entry into clear light.

original: de las skad cig las rab tu bzhengs pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de las skad cig las rab tu bzhengs pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The sambhogakāya is the arising in an instant from that.

original: de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Those are also of two kinds:

original: dri ma dang bcas pa dang dri ma med pa'i dbye ba las so //
analyzed: dri ma dang bcas pa dang dri ma med pa'i dbye ba las so //
translated: The division is into the stained and stainless.

original: de la dri ma dang bcas pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dri ma dang bcas pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Among them, the stained is to be posited by means of the nature of self-consecration.

original: dri ma med pa ni zung 'jug gi bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: dri ma med pa ni zung 'jug gi bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: The stainless is by means of the nature of union.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ni rang nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ni rang nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The completion stage will be explained by itself.

original: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku rnams //
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku rnams //
translated: The dharmakāya and saṃbhogakāya

original: zhes pa ma ning nyid bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa ma ning nyid bstan to //
translated: are taught to be the neuter.

original: 'di dag gis nye bar mtshon nas sprul pa'i sku yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gis nye bar mtshon nas sprul pa'i sku yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the nirmāṇakāya is also illustrated by these.

original: gsungs pa'i don nyid rgyas par ston pa lus kyi zhes pa la sogs pa de nyid lus kyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: gsungs pa'i don nyid rgyas par ston pa lus kyi zhes pa la sogs pa de nyid lus kyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The meaning of the statement is taught extensively in the line “the body maṇḍala” and so on.

original: manda ni snying po bde ba chen po'i sku'o //
analyzed: manda ni snying po bde ba chen po'i sku'o //
translated: Maṇḍala is the essence, the great bliss body.

original: la ni len par byed pa'o //
analyzed: la ni len par byed pa'o //
translated: La is the appropriator.

original: gsungs zhes pa 'dus pa la sogs par te /
analyzed: gsungs zhes pa 'dus pa la sogs par te /
translated: The statement is in the Guhyasamāja and so on.

original: rang gi yang gnas gzhan gsungs pa'i skabs su bstan to //
analyzed: rang gi yang gnas gzhan gsungs pa'i skabs su bstan to //
translated: One’s own is taught in the context of the other places.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pas brtan pa thob pa dbang po rnon po rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug go zhes go rims nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pas brtan pa thob pa dbang po rnon po rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug go zhes go rims nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the sequence, he says:

original: bskyed pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste dbang po rtul po'i gang zag mngal skyes la sogs pa skye gnas bzhi'i rim pas thog mar rim gyis rdzogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo mtha' dag rnam par rtog pa la gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste dbang po rtul po'i gang zag mngal skyes la sogs pa skye gnas bzhi'i rim pas thog mar rim gyis rdzogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo mtha' dag rnam par rtog pa la gsal bar bya'o //
translated: The person of dull faculties should first visualize the entire divine wheel in stages in accordance with the sequence of the four modes of birth, such as birth from a womb, etc.

original: dbang po 'bring po ni skad cig nyid la skye gnas rdzus te skyes pa ltar lhan cig nyid la rnam gnas bzhi'i rim pas dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi 'gro ba kho na lha'i rnam pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje ro gcig pa nyid la rang
analyzed: dbang po 'bring po ni skad cig nyid la skye gnas rdzus te skyes pa ltar lhan cig nyid la rnam gnas bzhi'i rim pas dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi 'gro ba kho na lha'i rnam pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje ro gcig pa nyid la rang
